00078         [LCK_MINMODE] = MDL_MINMODE,
00079         [LCK_EX]      = MDL_EX,
00080         [LCK_PW]      = MDL_PW,
00081         [LCK_PR]      = MDL_PR,
00082         [LCK_CW]      = MDL_CW,
00083         [LCK_CR]      = MDL_CR,

00134 __u64 mdt_get_disposition(struct ldlm_reply *rep, __u64 op_flag)
00135 {
00136         if (!rep)
00137                 return 0;
00138         return rep->lock_policy_res1 & op_flag;
00139 }
00140 
00141 void mdt_clear_disposition(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00142                            struct ldlm_reply *rep, __u64 op_flag)
00143 {
00144         if (info) {
00145                 info->mti_opdata &= ~op_flag;
00146                 tgt_opdata_clear(info->mti_env, op_flag);
00147         }
00148         if (rep)
00149                 rep->lock_policy_res1 &= ~op_flag;
00150 }
00151 
00152 void mdt_set_disposition(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00153                          struct ldlm_reply *rep, __u64 op_flag)
00154 {
00155         if (info) {
00156                 info->mti_opdata |= op_flag;
00157                 tgt_opdata_set(info->mti_env, op_flag);
00158         }
00159         if (rep)
00160                 rep->lock_policy_res1 |= op_flag;
00161 }

00163 void mdt_lock_reg_init(struct mdt_lock_handle *lh, enum ldlm_mode lm)
00164 {
00165         lh->mlh_pdo_hash = 0;
00166         lh->mlh_reg_mode = lm;
00167         lh->mlh_rreg_mode = lm;
00168         lh->mlh_type = MDT_REG_LOCK;
00169 }
00170 
00171 void mdt_lock_pdo_init(struct mdt_lock_handle *lh, enum ldlm_mode lock_mode,
00172                        const struct lu_name *lname)
00173 {
00174         lh->mlh_reg_mode = lock_mode;
00175         lh->mlh_pdo_mode = LCK_MINMODE;
00176         lh->mlh_rreg_mode = lock_mode;
00177         lh->mlh_type = MDT_PDO_LOCK;
00178 
00179         if (lu_name_is_valid(lname)) {
00180                 lh->mlh_pdo_hash = full_name_hash(lname->ln_name,
00181                                                   lname->ln_namelen);
00182                 /* XXX Workaround for LU-2856
00183                  *
00184                  * Zero is a valid return value of full_name_hash, but
00185                  * several users of mlh_pdo_hash assume a non-zero
00186                  * hash value. We therefore map zero onto an
00187                  * arbitrary, but consistent value (1) to avoid
00188                  * problems further down the road. */
00189                 if (unlikely(lh->mlh_pdo_hash == 0))
00190                         lh->mlh_pdo_hash = 1;
00191         } else {
00192                 lh->mlh_pdo_hash = 0;
00193         }
00194 }
00195 
00196 static void mdt_lock_pdo_mode(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *o,
00197                               struct mdt_lock_handle *lh)
00198 {
00199         mdl_mode_t mode;
00200         ENTRY;
00201 
00202         /*
00203          * Any dir access needs couple of locks:
00204          *
00205          * 1) on part of dir we gonna take lookup/modify;
00206          *
00207          * 2) on whole dir to protect it from concurrent splitting and/or to
00208          * flush client's cache for readdir().
00209          *
00210          * so, for a given mode and object this routine decides what lock mode
00211          * to use for lock #2:
00212          *
00213          * 1) if caller's gonna lookup in dir then we need to protect dir from
00214          * being splitted only - LCK_CR
00215          *
00216          * 2) if caller's gonna modify dir then we need to protect dir from
00217          * being splitted and to flush cache - LCK_CW
00218          *
00219          * 3) if caller's gonna modify dir and that dir seems ready for
00220          * splitting then we need to protect it from any type of access
00221          * (lookup/modify/split) - LCK_EX --bzzz
00222          */
00223 
00224         LASSERT(lh->mlh_reg_mode != LCK_MINMODE);
00225         LASSERT(lh->mlh_pdo_mode == LCK_MINMODE);
00226 
00227         /*
00228          * Ask underlaying level its opinion about preferable PDO lock mode
00229          * having access type passed as regular lock mode:
00230          *
00231          * - MDL_MINMODE means that lower layer does not want to specify lock
00232          * mode;
00233          *
00234          * - MDL_NL means that no PDO lock should be taken. This is used in some
00235          * cases. Say, for non-splittable directories no need to use PDO locks
00236          * at all.
00237          */
00238         mode = mdo_lock_mode(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(o),
00239                              mdt_dlm_mode2mdl_mode(lh->mlh_reg_mode));
00240 
00241         if (mode != MDL_MINMODE) {
00242                 lh->mlh_pdo_mode = mdt_mdl_mode2dlm_mode(mode);
00243         } else {
00244                 /*
00245                  * Lower layer does not want to specify locking mode. We do it
00246                  * our selves. No special protection is needed, just flush
00247                  * client's cache on modification and allow concurrent
00248                  * mondification.
00249                  */
00250                 switch (lh->mlh_reg_mode) {
00251                 case LCK_EX:
00252                         lh->mlh_pdo_mode = LCK_EX;
00253                         break;
00254                 case LCK_PR:
00255                         lh->mlh_pdo_mode = LCK_CR;
00256                         break;
00257                 case LCK_PW:
00258                         lh->mlh_pdo_mode = LCK_CW;
00259                         break;
00260                 default:
00261                         CERROR("Not expected lock type (0x%x)\n",
00262                                (int)lh->mlh_reg_mode);
00263                         LBUG();
00264                 }
00265         }
00266 
00267         LASSERT(lh->mlh_pdo_mode != LCK_MINMODE);
00268         EXIT;
00269 }
00270 
00271 static int mdt_lookup_fileset(struct mdt_thread_info *info, const char *fileset,
00272                               struct lu_fid *fid)
00273 {
00274         struct mdt_device *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
00275         struct lu_name *lname = &info->mti_name;
00276         char *name = NULL;
00277         struct mdt_object *parent;
00278         u32 mode;
00279         int rc = 0;
00280 
00281         LASSERT(!info->mti_cross_ref);
00282 
00283         OBD_ALLOC(name, NAME_MAX + 1);
00284         if (name == NULL)
00285                 return -ENOMEM;
00286         lname->ln_name = name;
00287 
00288         /*
00289          * We may want to allow this to mount a completely separate
00290          * fileset from the MDT in the future, but keeping it to
00291          * ROOT/ only for now avoid potential security issues.
00292          */
00293         *fid = mdt->mdt_md_root_fid;
00294 
00295         while (rc == 0 && fileset != NULL && *fileset != '\0') {
00296                 const char *s1 = fileset;
00297                 const char *s2;
00298 
00299                 while (*++s1 == '/')
00300                         ;
00301                 s2 = s1;
00302                 while (*s2 != '/' && *s2 != '\0')
00303                         s2++;
00304 
00305                 if (s2 == s1)
00306                         break;
00307 
00308                 fileset = s2;
00309 
00310                 lname->ln_namelen = s2 - s1;
00311                 if (lname->ln_namelen > NAME_MAX) {
00312                         rc = -EINVAL;
00313                         break;
00314                 }
00315 
00316                 /* reject .. as a path component */
00317                 if (lname->ln_namelen == 2 &&
00318                     strncmp(s1, "..", 2) == 0) {
00319                         rc = -EINVAL;
00320                         break;
00321                 }
00322 
00323                 strncpy(name, s1, lname->ln_namelen);
00324                 name[lname->ln_namelen] = '\0';
00325 
00326                 parent = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, mdt, fid);
00327                 if (IS_ERR(parent)) {
00328                         rc = PTR_ERR(parent);
00329                         break;
00330                 }
00331                 /* Only got the fid of this obj by name */
00332                 fid_zero(fid);
00333                 rc = mdo_lookup(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(parent), lname,
00334                                 fid, &info->mti_spec);
00335                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, parent);
00336         }
00337         if (!rc) {
00338                 parent = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, mdt, fid);
00339                 if (IS_ERR(parent))
00340                         rc = PTR_ERR(parent);
00341                 else {
00342                         mode = lu_object_attr(&parent->mot_obj);
00343                         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, parent);
00344                         if (!S_ISDIR(mode))
00345                                 rc = -ENOTDIR;
00346                 }
00347         }
00348 
00349         OBD_FREE(name, NAME_MAX + 1);
00350 
00351         return rc;
00352 }
00353 
00354 static int mdt_get_root(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00355 {
00356         struct mdt_thread_info  *info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
00357         struct mdt_device       *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
00358         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
00359         char                    *fileset;
00360         int                      rc;
00361 
00362         ENTRY;
00363 
00364         rc = mdt_check_ucred(info);
00365         if (rc)
00366                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
00367 
00368         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_GET_ROOT_PACK))
00369                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(-ENOMEM));
00370 
00371         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00372         if (req_capsule_get_size(info->mti_pill, &RMF_NAME, RCL_CLIENT) > 0) {
00373                 fileset = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_NAME);
00374                 if (fileset == NULL)
00375                         GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(-EFAULT));
00376 
00377                 rc = mdt_lookup_fileset(info, fileset, &repbody->mbo_fid1);
00378                 if (rc < 0)
00379                         GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
00380         } else {
00381                 repbody->mbo_fid1 = mdt->mdt_md_root_fid;
00382         }
00383         repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLID;
00384 
00385         EXIT;
00386 out:
00387         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
00388         return rc;
00389 }
00390 
00391 static int mdt_statfs(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00392 {
00393         struct ptlrpc_request           *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
00394         struct mdt_thread_info          *info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
00395         struct md_device                *next = info->mti_mdt->mdt_child;
00396         struct ptlrpc_service_part      *svcpt;
00397         struct obd_statfs               *osfs;
00398         int                             rc;
00399 
00400         ENTRY;
00401 
00402         svcpt = req->rq_rqbd->rqbd_svcpt;
00403 
00404         /* This will trigger a watchdog timeout */
00405         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_STATFS_LCW_SLEEP,
00406                          (MDT_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR *
00407                           at_get(&svcpt->scp_at_estimate)) + 1);
00408 
00409         rc = mdt_check_ucred(info);
00410         if (rc)
00411                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
00412 
00413         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_STATFS_PACK))
00414                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(-ENOMEM));
00415 
00416         osfs = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_OBD_STATFS);
00417         if (!osfs)
00418                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00419 
00421         if (cfs_time_before_64(info->mti_mdt->mdt_osfs_age,
00422                                cfs_time_shift_64(-OBD_STATFS_CACHE_SECONDS))) {
00424                 rc = next->md_ops->mdo_statfs(info->mti_env, next, osfs);
00425                 if (rc)
00426                         GOTO(out, rc);
00427                 spin_lock(&info->mti_mdt->mdt_osfs_lock);
00428                 info->mti_mdt->mdt_osfs = *osfs;
00429                 info->mti_mdt->mdt_osfs_age = cfs_time_current_64();
00430                 spin_unlock(&info->mti_mdt->mdt_osfs_lock);
00431         } else {
00433                 spin_lock(&info->mti_mdt->mdt_osfs_lock);
00434                 *osfs = info->mti_mdt->mdt_osfs;
00435                 spin_unlock(&info->mti_mdt->mdt_osfs_lock);
00436         }
00437 
00438         if (rc == 0)
00439                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_STATFS);
00440 out:
00441         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
00442         RETURN(rc);
00443 }
00444 
00445 #ifdef CONFIG_FS_POSIX_ACL
00446 /*
00447  * Pack ACL data into the reply. UIDs/GIDs are mapped and filtered by nodemap.
00448  *
00449  * \param       info    thread info object
00450  * \param       repbody reply to pack ACLs into
00451  * \param       o       mdt object of file to examine
00452  * \param       nodemap nodemap of client to reply to
00453  * \retval      0       success
00454  * \retval      -errno  error getting or parsing ACL from disk
00455  */
00456 int mdt_pack_acl2body(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_body *repbody,
00457                       struct mdt_object *o, struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00458 {
00459         const struct lu_env     *env = info->mti_env;
00460         struct md_object        *next = mdt_object_child(o);
00461         struct lu_buf           *buf = &info->mti_buf;
00462         int rc;
00463 
00464         buf->lb_buf = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_ACL);
00465         buf->lb_len = req_capsule_get_size(info->mti_pill, &RMF_ACL,
00466                                            RCL_SERVER);
00467         if (buf->lb_len == 0)
00468                 return 0;
00469 
00470         rc = mo_xattr_get(env, next, buf, XATTR_NAME_ACL_ACCESS);
00471         if (rc < 0) {
00472                 if (rc == -ENODATA) {
00473                         repbody->mbo_aclsize = 0;
00474                         repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLACL;
00475                         rc = 0;
00476                 } else if (rc == -EOPNOTSUPP) {
00477                         rc = 0;
00478                 } else {
00479                         CERROR("%s: unable to read "DFID" ACL: rc = %d\n",
00480                                mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
00481                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), rc);
00482                 }
00483         } else {
00484                 rc = nodemap_map_acl(nodemap, buf->lb_buf,
00485                                      rc, NODEMAP_FS_TO_CLIENT);
00486                 /* if all ACLs mapped out, rc is still >= 0 */
00487                 if (rc < 0) {
00488                         CERROR("%s: nodemap_map_acl unable to parse "DFID
00489                                " ACL: rc = %d\n", mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
00490                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), rc);
00491                 } else {
00492                         repbody->mbo_aclsize = rc;
00493                         repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLACL;
00494                         rc = 0;
00495                 }
00496         }
00497         return rc;
00498 }
00499 #endif
00500 
00501 void mdt_pack_attr2body(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_body *b,
00502                         const struct lu_attr *attr, const struct lu_fid *fid)
00503 {
00504         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00505         struct obd_export       *exp = info->mti_exp;
00506         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
00507 
00508         LASSERT(ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE);
00509 
00510         if (attr->la_valid & LA_ATIME) {
00511                 b->mbo_atime = attr->la_atime;
00512                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLATIME;
00513         }
00514         if (attr->la_valid & LA_MTIME) {
00515                 b->mbo_mtime = attr->la_mtime;
00516                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLMTIME;
00517         }
00518         if (attr->la_valid & LA_CTIME) {
00519                 b->mbo_ctime = attr->la_ctime;
00520                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLCTIME;
00521         }
00522         if (attr->la_valid & LA_FLAGS) {
00523                 b->mbo_flags = attr->la_flags;
00524                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLFLAGS;
00525         }
00526         if (attr->la_valid & LA_NLINK) {
00527                 b->mbo_nlink = attr->la_nlink;
00528                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLNLINK;
00529         }
00530         if (attr->la_valid & LA_UID) {
00531                 b->mbo_uid = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_UID,
00532                                             NODEMAP_FS_TO_CLIENT,
00533                                             attr->la_uid);
00534                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLUID;
00535         }
00536         if (attr->la_valid & LA_GID) {
00537                 b->mbo_gid = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_GID,
00538                                             NODEMAP_FS_TO_CLIENT,
00539                                             attr->la_gid);
00540                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLGID;
00541         }
00542         b->mbo_mode = attr->la_mode;
00543         if (attr->la_valid & LA_MODE)
00544                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLMODE;
00545         if (attr->la_valid & LA_TYPE)
00546                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLTYPE;
00547 
00548         if (fid != NULL) {
00549                 b->mbo_fid1 = *fid;
00550                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLID;
00551                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, DFID": nlink=%d, mode=%o, valid="LPX64"\n",
00552                        PFID(fid), b->mbo_nlink, b->mbo_mode, b->mbo_valid);
00553         }
00554 
00555         if (info != NULL)
00556                 mdt_body_reverse_idmap(info, b);
00557 
00558         if (!(attr->la_valid & LA_TYPE))
00559                 return;
00560 
00561         b->mbo_rdev   = attr->la_rdev;
00562         b->mbo_size   = attr->la_size;
00563         b->mbo_blocks = attr->la_blocks;
00564 
00565         if (!S_ISREG(attr->la_mode)) {
00566                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLSIZE | OBD_MD_FLBLOCKS | OBD_MD_FLRDEV;
00567         } else if (ma->ma_need & MA_LOV && !(ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV)) {
00568                 /* means no objects are allocated on osts. */
00569                 LASSERT(!(ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV));
00570                 /* just ignore blocks occupied by extend attributes on MDS */
00571                 b->mbo_blocks = 0;
00572                 /* if no object is allocated on osts, the size on mds is valid.
00573                  * b=22272 */
00574                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLSIZE | OBD_MD_FLBLOCKS;
00575         } else if ((ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV) && ma->ma_lmm != NULL &&
00576                    ma->ma_lmm->lmm_pattern & LOV_PATTERN_F_RELEASED) {
00577                 /* A released file stores its size on MDS. */
00578                 /* But return 1 block for released file, unless tools like tar
00579                  * will consider it fully sparse. (LU-3864)
00580                  */
00581                 if (unlikely(b->mbo_size == 0))
00582                         b->mbo_blocks = 0;
00583                 else
00584                         b->mbo_blocks = 1;
00585                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLSIZE | OBD_MD_FLBLOCKS;
00586         }
00587 
00588         if (fid != NULL && (b->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLSIZE))
00589                 CDEBUG(D_VFSTRACE, DFID": returning size %llu\n",
00590                        PFID(fid), (unsigned long long)b->mbo_size);
00591 }
00592 
00593 static inline int mdt_body_has_lov(const struct lu_attr *la,
00594                                    const struct mdt_body *body)
00595 {
00596         return (S_ISREG(la->la_mode) && (body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLEASIZE)) ||
00597                (S_ISDIR(la->la_mode) && (body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLDIREA));
00598 }
00599 
00600 void mdt_client_compatibility(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00601 {
00602         struct mdt_body       *body;
00603         struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00604         struct obd_export     *exp = req->rq_export;
00605         struct md_attr        *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00606         struct lu_attr        *la = &ma->ma_attr;
00607         ENTRY;
00608 
00609         if (exp_connect_layout(exp))
00610                 /* the client can deal with 16-bit lmm_stripe_count */
00611                 RETURN_EXIT;
00612 
00613         body = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00614 
00615         if (!mdt_body_has_lov(la, body))
00616                 RETURN_EXIT;
00617 
00618         /* now we have a reply with a lov for a client not compatible with the
00619          * layout lock so we have to clean the layout generation number */
00620         if (S_ISREG(la->la_mode))
00621                 ma->ma_lmm->lmm_layout_gen = 0;
00622         EXIT;
00623 }
00624 
00625 static int mdt_attr_get_eabuf_size(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00626                                    struct mdt_object *o)
00627 {
00628         const struct lu_env *env = info->mti_env;
00629         int rc, rc2;
00630 
00631         rc = mo_xattr_get(env, mdt_object_child(o), &LU_BUF_NULL,
00632                           XATTR_NAME_LOV);
00633 
00634         if (rc == -ENODATA)
00635                 rc = 0;
00636 
00637         if (rc < 0)
00638                 goto out;
00639 
00640         /* Is it a directory? Let's check for the LMV as well */
00641         if (S_ISDIR(lu_object_attr(&mdt_object_child(o)->mo_lu))) {
00642                 rc2 = mo_xattr_get(env, mdt_object_child(o), &LU_BUF_NULL,
00643                                    XATTR_NAME_LMV);
00644 
00645                 if (rc2 == -ENODATA)
00646                         rc2 = mo_xattr_get(env, mdt_object_child(o),
00647                                            &LU_BUF_NULL,
00648                                            XATTR_NAME_DEFAULT_LMV);
00649 
00650                 if ((rc2 < 0 && rc2 != -ENODATA) || (rc2 > rc))
00651                         rc = rc2;
00652         }
00653 
00654 out:
00655         return rc;
00656 }
00657 
00658 int mdt_big_xattr_get(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *o,
00659                       const char *name)
00660 {
00661         const struct lu_env *env = info->mti_env;
00662         int rc;
00663         ENTRY;
00664 
00665         LASSERT(info->mti_big_lmm_used == 0);
00666         rc = mo_xattr_get(env, mdt_object_child(o), &LU_BUF_NULL, name);
00667         if (rc < 0)
00668                 RETURN(rc);
00669 
00670         /* big_lmm may need to be grown */
00671         if (info->mti_big_lmmsize < rc) {
00672                 int size = size_roundup_power2(rc);
00673 
00674                 if (info->mti_big_lmmsize > 0) {
00675                         /* free old buffer */
00676                         LASSERT(info->mti_big_lmm);
00677                         OBD_FREE_LARGE(info->mti_big_lmm,
00678                                        info->mti_big_lmmsize);
00679                         info->mti_big_lmm = NULL;
00680                         info->mti_big_lmmsize = 0;
00681                 }
00682 
00683                 OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(info->mti_big_lmm, size);
00684                 if (info->mti_big_lmm == NULL)
00685                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00686                 info->mti_big_lmmsize = size;
00687         }
00688         LASSERT(info->mti_big_lmmsize >= rc);
00689 
00690         info->mti_buf.lb_buf = info->mti_big_lmm;
00691         info->mti_buf.lb_len = info->mti_big_lmmsize;
00692         rc = mo_xattr_get(env, mdt_object_child(o), &info->mti_buf, name);
00693 
00694         RETURN(rc);
00695 }
00696 
00697 int mdt_stripe_get(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *o,
00698                    struct md_attr *ma, const char *name)
00699 {
00700         struct md_object *next = mdt_object_child(o);
00701         struct lu_buf    *buf = &info->mti_buf;
00702         int rc;
00703 
00704         if (strcmp(name, XATTR_NAME_LOV) == 0) {
00705                 buf->lb_buf = ma->ma_lmm;
00706                 buf->lb_len = ma->ma_lmm_size;
00707                 LASSERT(!(ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV));
00708         } else if (strcmp(name, XATTR_NAME_LMV) == 0) {
00709                 buf->lb_buf = ma->ma_lmv;
00710                 buf->lb_len = ma->ma_lmv_size;
00711                 LASSERT(!(ma->ma_valid & MA_LMV));
00712         } else if (strcmp(name, XATTR_NAME_DEFAULT_LMV) == 0) {
00713                 buf->lb_buf = ma->ma_lmv;
00714                 buf->lb_len = ma->ma_lmv_size;
00715                 LASSERT(!(ma->ma_valid & MA_LMV_DEF));
00716         } else {
00717                 return -EINVAL;
00718         }
00719 
00720         rc = mo_xattr_get(info->mti_env, next, buf, name);
00721         if (rc > 0) {
00722 
00723 got:
00724                 if (strcmp(name, XATTR_NAME_LOV) == 0) {
00725                         if (info->mti_big_lmm_used)
00726                                 ma->ma_lmm = info->mti_big_lmm;
00727 
00728                         /* NOT return LOV EA with hole to old client. */
00729                         if (unlikely(le32_to_cpu(ma->ma_lmm->lmm_pattern) &
00730                                      LOV_PATTERN_F_HOLE) &&
00731                             !(exp_connect_flags(info->mti_exp) &
00732                               OBD_CONNECT_LFSCK)) {
00733                                 return -EIO;
00734                         } else {
00735                                 ma->ma_lmm_size = rc;
00736                                 ma->ma_valid |= MA_LOV;
00737                         }
00738                 } else if (strcmp(name, XATTR_NAME_LMV) == 0) {
00739                         if (info->mti_big_lmm_used)
00740                                 ma->ma_lmv = info->mti_big_lmm;
00741 
00742                         ma->ma_lmv_size = rc;
00743                         ma->ma_valid |= MA_LMV;
00744                 } else if (strcmp(name, XATTR_NAME_DEFAULT_LMV) == 0) {
00745                         ma->ma_lmv_size = rc;
00746                         ma->ma_valid |= MA_LMV_DEF;
00747                 }
00748 
00749                 /* Update mdt_max_mdsize so all clients will be aware that */
00750                 if (info->mti_mdt->mdt_max_mdsize < rc)
00751                         info->mti_mdt->mdt_max_mdsize = rc;
00752 
00753                 rc = 0;
00754         } else if (rc == -ENODATA) {
00755                 /* no LOV EA */
00756                 rc = 0;
00757         } else if (rc == -ERANGE) {
00758                 /* Default LMV has fixed size, so it must be able to fit
00759                  * in the original buffer */
00760                 if (strcmp(name, XATTR_NAME_DEFAULT_LMV) == 0)
00761                         return rc;
00762                 rc = mdt_big_xattr_get(info, o, name);
00763                 if (rc > 0) {
00764                         info->mti_big_lmm_used = 1;
00765                         goto got;
00766                 }
00767         }
00768 
00769         return rc;
00770 }
00771 
00772 static int mdt_attr_get_pfid(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00773                              struct mdt_object *o, struct lu_fid *pfid)
00774 {
00775         struct lu_buf           *buf = &info->mti_buf;
00776         struct link_ea_header   *leh;
00777         struct link_ea_entry    *lee;
00778         int                      rc;
00779         ENTRY;
00780 
00781         buf->lb_buf = info->mti_big_lmm;
00782         buf->lb_len = info->mti_big_lmmsize;
00783         rc = mo_xattr_get(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(o),
00784                           buf, XATTR_NAME_LINK);
00785         /* ignore errors, MA_PFID won't be set and it is
00786          * up to the caller to treat this as an error */
00787         if (rc == -ERANGE || buf->lb_len == 0) {
00788                 rc = mdt_big_xattr_get(info, o, XATTR_NAME_LINK);
00789                 buf->lb_buf = info->mti_big_lmm;
00790                 buf->lb_len = info->mti_big_lmmsize;
00791         }
00792 
00793         if (rc < 0)
00794                 RETURN(rc);
00795         if (rc < sizeof(*leh)) {
00796                 CERROR("short LinkEA on "DFID": rc = %d\n",
00797                        PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), rc);
00798                 RETURN(-ENODATA);
00799         }
00800 
00801         leh = (struct link_ea_header *) buf->lb_buf;
00802         lee = (struct link_ea_entry *)(leh + 1);
00803         if (leh->leh_magic == __swab32(LINK_EA_MAGIC)) {
00804                 leh->leh_magic = LINK_EA_MAGIC;
00805                 leh->leh_reccount = __swab32(leh->leh_reccount);
00806                 leh->leh_len = __swab64(leh->leh_len);
00807         }
00808         if (leh->leh_magic != LINK_EA_MAGIC)
00809                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00810         if (leh->leh_reccount == 0)
00811                 RETURN(-ENODATA);
00812 
00813         memcpy(pfid, &lee->lee_parent_fid, sizeof(*pfid));
00814         fid_be_to_cpu(pfid, pfid);
00815 
00816         RETURN(0);
00817 }
00818 
00819 int mdt_attr_get_complex(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00820                          struct mdt_object *o, struct md_attr *ma)
00821 {
00822         const struct lu_env *env = info->mti_env;
00823         struct md_object    *next = mdt_object_child(o);
00824         struct lu_buf       *buf = &info->mti_buf;
00825         int                  need = ma->ma_need;
00826         int                  rc = 0, rc2;
00827         u32                  mode;
00828         ENTRY;
00829 
00830         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00831 
00832         if (mdt_object_exists(o) == 0)
00833                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOENT);
00834         mode = lu_object_attr(&next->mo_lu);
00835 
00836         if (need & MA_INODE) {
00837                 ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
00838                 rc = mo_attr_get(env, next, ma);
00839                 if (rc)
00840                         GOTO(out, rc);
00841                 ma->ma_valid |= MA_INODE;
00842         }
00843 
00844         if (need & MA_PFID) {
00845                 rc = mdt_attr_get_pfid(info, o, &ma->ma_pfid);
00846                 if (rc == 0)
00847                         ma->ma_valid |= MA_PFID;
00848                 /* ignore this error, parent fid is not mandatory */
00849                 rc = 0;
00850         }
00851 
00852         if (need & MA_LOV && (S_ISREG(mode) || S_ISDIR(mode))) {
00853                 rc = mdt_stripe_get(info, o, ma, XATTR_NAME_LOV);
00854                 if (rc)
00855                         GOTO(out, rc);
00856         }
00857 
00858         if (need & MA_LMV && S_ISDIR(mode)) {
00859                 rc = mdt_stripe_get(info, o, ma, XATTR_NAME_LMV);
00860                 if (rc != 0)
00861                         GOTO(out, rc);
00862         }
00863 
00864         if (need & MA_LMV_DEF && S_ISDIR(mode)) {
00865                 rc = mdt_stripe_get(info, o, ma, XATTR_NAME_DEFAULT_LMV);
00866                 if (rc != 0)
00867                         GOTO(out, rc);
00868         }
00869 
00870         if (need & MA_HSM && S_ISREG(mode)) {
00871                 buf->lb_buf = info->mti_xattr_buf;
00872                 buf->lb_len = sizeof(info->mti_xattr_buf);
00873                 CLASSERT(sizeof(struct hsm_attrs) <=
00874                          sizeof(info->mti_xattr_buf));
00875                 rc2 = mo_xattr_get(info->mti_env, next, buf, XATTR_NAME_HSM);
00876                 rc2 = lustre_buf2hsm(info->mti_xattr_buf, rc2, &ma->ma_hsm);
00877                 if (rc2 == 0)
00878                         ma->ma_valid |= MA_HSM;
00879                 else if (rc2 < 0 && rc2 != -ENODATA)
00880                         GOTO(out, rc = rc2);
00881         }
00882 
00883 #ifdef CONFIG_FS_POSIX_ACL
00884         if (need & MA_ACL_DEF && S_ISDIR(mode)) {
00885                 buf->lb_buf = ma->ma_acl;
00886                 buf->lb_len = ma->ma_acl_size;
00887                 rc2 = mo_xattr_get(env, next, buf, XATTR_NAME_ACL_DEFAULT);
00888                 if (rc2 > 0) {
00889                         ma->ma_acl_size = rc2;
00890                         ma->ma_valid |= MA_ACL_DEF;
00891                 } else if (rc2 == -ENODATA) {
00892                         /* no ACLs */
00893                         ma->ma_acl_size = 0;
00894                 } else
00895                         GOTO(out, rc = rc2);
00896         }
00897 #endif
00898 out:
00899         ma->ma_need = need;
00900         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "after getattr rc = %d, ma_valid = "LPX64" ma_lmm=%p\n",
00901                rc, ma->ma_valid, ma->ma_lmm);
00902         RETURN(rc);
00903 }
00904 
00905 static int mdt_getattr_internal(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00906                                 struct mdt_object *o, int ma_need)
00907 {
00908         struct md_object        *next = mdt_object_child(o);
00909         const struct mdt_body   *reqbody = info->mti_body;
00910         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00911         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00912         struct lu_attr          *la = &ma->ma_attr;
00913         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
00914         const struct lu_env     *env = info->mti_env;
00915         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
00916         struct lu_buf           *buffer = &info->mti_buf;
00917         struct obd_export       *exp = info->mti_exp;
00918         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
00919         int                      rc;
00920         int                      is_root;
00921         ENTRY;
00922 
00923         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_GETATTR_PACK))
00924                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
00925 
00926         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00927 
00928         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00929 
00930         if (mdt_object_remote(o)) {
00931                 /* This object is located on remote node.*/
00932                 /* Return -ENOTSUPP for old client */
00933                 if (!mdt_is_dne_client(req->rq_export))
00934                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTSUPP);
00935 
00936                 repbody->mbo_fid1 = *mdt_object_fid(o);
00937                 repbody->mbo_valid = OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_MDS;
00938                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00939         }
00940 
00941         if (reqbody->mbo_eadatasize > 0) {
00942                 buffer->lb_buf = req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD);
00943                 if (buffer->lb_buf == NULL)
00944                         GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00945                 buffer->lb_len = req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD,
00946                                                       RCL_SERVER);
00947         } else {
00948                 buffer->lb_buf = NULL;
00949                 buffer->lb_len = 0;
00950                 ma_need &= ~(MA_LOV | MA_LMV);
00951                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: RPC from %s: does not need LOVEA.\n",
00952                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
00953                        req->rq_export->exp_client_uuid.uuid);
00954         }
00955 
00956         /* If it is dir object and client require MEA, then we got MEA */
00957         if (S_ISDIR(lu_object_attr(&next->mo_lu)) &&
00958             (reqbody->mbo_valid & (OBD_MD_MEA | OBD_MD_DEFAULT_MEA))) {
00959                 /* Assumption: MDT_MD size is enough for lmv size. */
00960                 ma->ma_lmv = buffer->lb_buf;
00961                 ma->ma_lmv_size = buffer->lb_len;
00962                 ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
00963                 if (ma->ma_lmv_size > 0) {
00964                         if (reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_MEA)
00965                                 ma->ma_need |= MA_LMV;
00966                         else if (reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_DEFAULT_MEA)
00967                                 ma->ma_need |= MA_LMV_DEF;
00968                 }
00969         } else {
00970                 ma->ma_lmm = buffer->lb_buf;
00971                 ma->ma_lmm_size = buffer->lb_len;
00972                 ma->ma_need = MA_INODE | MA_HSM;
00973                 if (ma->ma_lmm_size > 0)
00974                         ma->ma_need |= MA_LOV;
00975         }
00976 
00977         if (S_ISDIR(lu_object_attr(&next->mo_lu)) &&
00978             reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLDIREA  &&
00979             lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg) == MDS_GETATTR) {
00980                 /* get default stripe info for this dir. */
00981                 ma->ma_need |= MA_LOV_DEF;
00982         }
00983         ma->ma_need |= ma_need;
00984 
00985         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, o, ma);
00986         if (unlikely(rc)) {
00987                 CERROR("%s: getattr error for "DFID": rc = %d\n",
00988                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
00989                        PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), rc);
00990                 RETURN(rc);
00991         }
00992 
00993         /* if file is released, check if a restore is running */
00994         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_HSM) {
00995                 repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_TSTATE;
00996                 if ((ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags & HS_RELEASED) &&
00997                     mdt_hsm_restore_is_running(info, mdt_object_fid(o)))
00998                         repbody->mbo_t_state = MS_RESTORE;
00999         }
01000 
01001         is_root = lu_fid_eq(mdt_object_fid(o), &info->mti_mdt->mdt_md_root_fid);
01002 
01003         /* the Lustre protocol supposes to return default striping
01004          * on the user-visible root if explicitly requested */
01005         if ((ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV) == 0 && S_ISDIR(la->la_mode) &&
01006             (ma->ma_need & MA_LOV_DEF && is_root) && ma->ma_need & MA_LOV) {
01007                 struct lu_fid      rootfid;
01008                 struct mdt_object *root;
01009                 struct mdt_device *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
01010 
01011                 rc = dt_root_get(env, mdt->mdt_bottom, &rootfid);
01012                 if (rc)
01013                         RETURN(rc);
01014                 root = mdt_object_find(env, mdt, &rootfid);
01015                 if (IS_ERR(root))
01016                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(root));
01017                 rc = mdt_stripe_get(info, root, ma, XATTR_NAME_LOV);
01018                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, root);
01019                 if (unlikely(rc)) {
01020                         CERROR("%s: getattr error for "DFID": rc = %d\n",
01021                                mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01022                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), rc);
01023                         RETURN(rc);
01024                 }
01025         }
01026 
01027         if (likely(ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE))
01028                 mdt_pack_attr2body(info, repbody, la, mdt_object_fid(o));
01029         else
01030                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01031 
01032         if (mdt_body_has_lov(la, reqbody)) {
01033                 if (ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV) {
01034                         LASSERT(ma->ma_lmm_size);
01035                         repbody->mbo_eadatasize = ma->ma_lmm_size;
01036                         if (S_ISDIR(la->la_mode))
01037                                 repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLDIREA;
01038                         else
01039                                 repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLEASIZE;
01040                         mdt_dump_lmm(D_INFO, ma->ma_lmm, repbody->mbo_valid);
01041                 }
01042                 if (ma->ma_valid & MA_LMV) {
01043                         /* Return -ENOTSUPP for old client */
01044                         if (!mdt_is_striped_client(req->rq_export))
01045                                 RETURN(-ENOTSUPP);
01046 
01047                         LASSERT(S_ISDIR(la->la_mode));
01048                         mdt_dump_lmv(D_INFO, ma->ma_lmv);
01049                         repbody->mbo_eadatasize = ma->ma_lmv_size;
01050                         repbody->mbo_valid |= (OBD_MD_FLDIREA|OBD_MD_MEA);
01051                 }
01052                 if (ma->ma_valid & MA_LMV_DEF) {
01053                         /* Return -ENOTSUPP for old client */
01054                         if (!mdt_is_striped_client(req->rq_export))
01055                                 RETURN(-ENOTSUPP);
01056                         LASSERT(S_ISDIR(la->la_mode));
01057                         repbody->mbo_eadatasize = ma->ma_lmv_size;
01058                         repbody->mbo_valid |= (OBD_MD_FLDIREA |
01059                                                OBD_MD_DEFAULT_MEA);
01060                 }
01061         } else if (S_ISLNK(la->la_mode) &&
01062                    reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_LINKNAME) {
01063                 buffer->lb_buf = ma->ma_lmm;
01064                 /* eadatasize from client includes NULL-terminator, so
01065                  * there is no need to read it */
01066                 buffer->lb_len = reqbody->mbo_eadatasize - 1;
01067                 rc = mo_readlink(env, next, buffer);
01068                 if (unlikely(rc <= 0)) {
01069                         CERROR("%s: readlink failed for "DFID": rc = %d\n",
01070                                mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01071                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), rc);
01072                         rc = -EFAULT;
01073                 } else {
01074                         int print_limit = min_t(int, PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 128, rc);
01075 
01076                         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_READLINK_EPROTO))
01077                                 rc -= 2;
01078                         repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_LINKNAME;
01079                         /* we need to report back size with NULL-terminator
01080                          * because client expects that */
01081                         repbody->mbo_eadatasize = rc + 1;
01082                         if (repbody->mbo_eadatasize != reqbody->mbo_eadatasize)
01083                                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "%s: Read shorter symlink %d "
01084                                        "on "DFID ", expected %d\n",
01085                                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01086                                        rc, PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)),
01087                                        reqbody->mbo_eadatasize - 1);
01088                         /* NULL terminate */
01089                         ((char *)ma->ma_lmm)[rc] = 0;
01090 
01091                         /* If the total CDEBUG() size is larger than a page, it
01092                          * will print a warning to the console, avoid this by
01093                          * printing just the last part of the symlink. */
01094                         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "symlink dest %s%.*s, len = %d\n",
01095                                print_limit < rc ? "..." : "", print_limit,
01096                                (char *)ma->ma_lmm + rc - print_limit, rc);
01097                         rc = 0;
01098                 }
01099         }
01100 
01101         if (reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLMODEASIZE) {
01102                 repbody->mbo_max_mdsize = info->mti_mdt->mdt_max_mdsize;
01103                 repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLMODEASIZE;
01104                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "changing the max MD size to %u\n",
01105                        repbody->mbo_max_mdsize);
01106         }
01107 
01108         if (exp_connect_rmtclient(info->mti_exp) &&
01109             reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLRMTPERM) {
01110                 void *buf = req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_ACL);
01111 
01112                 /* mdt_getattr_lock only */
01113                 rc = mdt_pack_remote_perm(info, o, buf);
01114                 if (rc) {
01115                         repbody->mbo_valid &= ~OBD_MD_FLRMTPERM;
01116                         repbody->mbo_aclsize = 0;
01117                         RETURN(rc);
01118                 } else {
01119                         repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLRMTPERM;
01120                         repbody->mbo_aclsize = sizeof(struct mdt_remote_perm);
01121                 }
01122         }
01123 #ifdef CONFIG_FS_POSIX_ACL
01124         else if ((exp_connect_flags(req->rq_export) & OBD_CONNECT_ACL) &&
01125                  (reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLACL))
01126                 rc = mdt_pack_acl2body(info, repbody, o, nodemap);
01127 #endif
01128 
01129 out:
01130         if (rc == 0)
01131                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_GETATTR);
01132 
01133         RETURN(rc);
01134 }
01135 
01136 static int mdt_getattr(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01137 {
01138         struct mdt_thread_info  *info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
01139         struct mdt_object       *obj = info->mti_object;
01140         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
01141         struct mdt_body         *reqbody;
01142         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
01143         int rc, rc2;
01144         ENTRY;
01145 
01146         reqbody = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01147         LASSERT(reqbody);
01148         LASSERT(obj != NULL);
01149         LASSERT(lu_object_assert_exists(&obj->mot_obj));
01150 
01151         /* Unlike intent case where we need to pre-fill out buffers early on
01152          * in intent policy for ldlm reasons, here we can have a much better
01153          * guess at EA size by just reading it from disk.
01154          * Exceptions are readdir and (missing) directory striping */
01155         /* Readlink */
01156         if (reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_LINKNAME) {
01157                 /* No easy way to know how long is the symlink, but it cannot
01158                  * be more than PATH_MAX, so we allocate +1 */
01159                 rc = PATH_MAX + 1;
01160 
01161         /* A special case for fs ROOT: getattr there might fetch
01162          * default EA for entire fs, not just for this dir!
01163          */
01164         } else if (lu_fid_eq(mdt_object_fid(obj),
01165                              &info->mti_mdt->mdt_md_root_fid) &&
01166                    (reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLDIREA) &&
01167                    (lustre_msg_get_opc(mdt_info_req(info)->rq_reqmsg) ==
01168                                                                  MDS_GETATTR)) {
01169                 /* Should the default strping be bigger, mdt_fix_reply
01170                  * will reallocate */
01171                 rc = DEF_REP_MD_SIZE;
01172         } else {
01173                 /* Read the actual EA size from disk */
01174                 rc = mdt_attr_get_eabuf_size(info, obj);
01175         }
01176 
01177         if (rc < 0)
01178                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
01179 
01180         req_capsule_set_size(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER, rc);
01181 
01182         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(pill);
01183         if (unlikely(rc != 0))
01184                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
01185 
01186         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01187         LASSERT(repbody != NULL);
01188         repbody->mbo_eadatasize = 0;
01189         repbody->mbo_aclsize = 0;
01190 
01191         if (reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLRMTPERM)
01192                 rc = mdt_init_ucred(info, reqbody);
01193         else
01194                 rc = mdt_check_ucred(info);
01195         if (unlikely(rc))
01196                 GOTO(out_shrink, rc);
01197 
01198         info->mti_cross_ref = !!(reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLCROSSREF);
01199 
01200         rc = mdt_getattr_internal(info, obj, 0);
01201         if (reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLRMTPERM)
01202                 mdt_exit_ucred(info);
01203         EXIT;
01204 out_shrink:
01205         mdt_client_compatibility(info);
01206         rc2 = mdt_fix_reply(info);
01207         if (rc == 0)
01208                 rc = rc2;
01209 out:
01210         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
01211         return rc;
01212 }
01213 
01222 static void mdt_swap_lov_flag(struct mdt_object *o1, struct mdt_object *o2)
01223 {
01224         __u64   o1_flags;
01225 
01226         mutex_lock(&o1->mot_lov_mutex);
01227         mutex_lock(&o2->mot_lov_mutex);
01228 
01229         o1_flags = o1->mot_flags;
01230         o1->mot_flags = (o1->mot_flags & ~MOF_LOV_CREATED) |
01231                         (o2->mot_flags & MOF_LOV_CREATED);
01232 
01233         o2->mot_flags = (o2->mot_flags & ~MOF_LOV_CREATED) |
01234                         (o1_flags & MOF_LOV_CREATED);
01235 
01236         mutex_unlock(&o2->mot_lov_mutex);
01237         mutex_unlock(&o1->mot_lov_mutex);
01238 }
01239 
01240 static int mdt_swap_layouts(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01241 {
01242         struct mdt_thread_info  *info;
01243         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
01244         struct obd_export       *exp = req->rq_export;
01245         struct mdt_object       *o1, *o2, *o;
01246         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh1, *lh2;
01247         struct mdc_swap_layouts *msl;
01248         int                      rc;
01249         ENTRY;
01250 
01251         /* client does not support layout lock, so layout swaping
01252          * is disabled.
01253          * FIXME: there is a problem for old clients which don't support
01254          * layout lock yet. If those clients have already opened the file
01255          * they won't be notified at all so that old layout may still be
01256          * used to do IO. This can be fixed after file release is landed by
01257          * doing exclusive open and taking full EX ibits lock. - Jinshan */
01258         if (!exp_connect_layout(exp))
01259                 RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
01260 
01261         info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
01262 
01263         if (info->mti_dlm_req != NULL)
01264                 ldlm_request_cancel(req, info->mti_dlm_req, 0, LATF_SKIP);
01265 
01266         o1 = info->mti_object;
01267         o = o2 = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt,
01268                                 &info->mti_body->mbo_fid2);
01269         if (IS_ERR(o))
01270                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(o));
01271 
01272         if (mdt_object_remote(o) || !mdt_object_exists(o)) /* remote object */
01273                 GOTO(put, rc = -ENOENT);
01274 
01275         rc = lu_fid_cmp(&info->mti_body->mbo_fid1, &info->mti_body->mbo_fid2);
01276         if (unlikely(rc == 0)) /* same file, you kidding me? no-op. */
01277                 GOTO(put, rc);
01278 
01279         if (rc < 0)
01280                 swap(o1, o2);
01281 
01282         /* permission check. Make sure the calling process having permission
01283          * to write both files. */
01284         rc = mo_permission(info->mti_env, NULL, mdt_object_child(o1), NULL,
01285                                 MAY_WRITE);
01286         if (rc < 0)
01287                 GOTO(put, rc);
01288 
01289         rc = mo_permission(info->mti_env, NULL, mdt_object_child(o2), NULL,
01290                                 MAY_WRITE);
01291         if (rc < 0)
01292                 GOTO(put, rc);
01293 
01294         msl = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_SWAP_LAYOUTS);
01295         if (msl == NULL)
01296                 GOTO(put, rc = -EPROTO);
01297 
01298         lh1 = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_NEW];
01299         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh1, LCK_EX);
01300         lh2 = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_OLD];
01301         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh2, LCK_EX);
01302 
01303         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, o1, lh1, MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT |
01304                              MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR);
01305         if (rc < 0)
01306                 GOTO(put, rc);
01307 
01308         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, o2, lh2, MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT |
01309                              MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR);
01310         if (rc < 0)
01311                 GOTO(unlock1, rc);
01312 
01313         rc = mo_swap_layouts(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(o1),
01314                              mdt_object_child(o2), msl->msl_flags);
01315         if (rc < 0)
01316                 GOTO(unlock2, rc);
01317 
01318         mdt_swap_lov_flag(o1, o2);
01319 
01320 unlock2:
01321         mdt_object_unlock(info, o2, lh2, rc);
01322 unlock1:
01323         mdt_object_unlock(info, o1, lh1, rc);
01324 put:
01325         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, o);
01326 out:
01327         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
01328         RETURN(rc);
01329 }
01330 
01331 static int mdt_raw_lookup(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01332                           struct mdt_object *parent,
01333                           const struct lu_name *lname,
01334                           struct ldlm_reply *ldlm_rep)
01335 {
01336         struct lu_fid   *child_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid1;
01337         int              rc;
01338         ENTRY;
01339 
01340         LASSERT(!info->mti_cross_ref);
01341 
01342         /* Only got the fid of this obj by name */
01343         fid_zero(child_fid);
01344         rc = mdo_lookup(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(info->mti_object),
01345                         lname, child_fid, &info->mti_spec);
01346         if (rc == 0) {
01347                 struct mdt_body *repbody;
01348 
01349                 repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01350                 repbody->mbo_fid1 = *child_fid;
01351                 repbody->mbo_valid = OBD_MD_FLID;
01352                 mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_LOOKUP_POS);
01353         } else if (rc == -ENOENT) {
01354                 mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_LOOKUP_NEG);
01355         }
01356 
01357         RETURN(rc);
01358 }
01359 
01360 /*
01361  * UPDATE lock should be taken against parent, and be released before exit;
01362  * child_bits lock should be taken against child, and be returned back:
01363  *            (1)normal request should release the child lock;
01364  *            (2)intent request will grant the lock to client.
01365  */
01366 static int mdt_getattr_name_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01367                                  struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc,
01368                                  __u64 child_bits,
01369                                  struct ldlm_reply *ldlm_rep)
01370 {
01371         struct ptlrpc_request  *req       = mdt_info_req(info);
01372         struct mdt_body        *reqbody   = NULL;
01373         struct mdt_object      *parent    = info->mti_object;
01374         struct mdt_object      *child;
01375         struct lu_fid          *child_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid1;
01376         struct lu_name         *lname     = NULL;
01377         struct mdt_lock_handle *lhp       = NULL;
01378         struct ldlm_lock       *lock;
01379         bool                    is_resent;
01380         bool                    try_layout;
01381         int                     ma_need = 0;
01382         int                     rc;
01383         ENTRY;
01384 
01385         is_resent = lustre_handle_is_used(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh);
01386         LASSERT(ergo(is_resent,
01387                      lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & MSG_RESENT));
01388 
01389         if (parent == NULL)
01390                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
01391 
01392         if (info->mti_cross_ref) {
01393                 /* Only getattr on the child. Parent is on another node. */
01394                 mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep,
01395                                     DISP_LOOKUP_EXECD | DISP_LOOKUP_POS);
01396                 child = parent;
01397                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "partial getattr_name child_fid = "DFID", "
01398                        "ldlm_rep = %p\n",
01399                        PFID(mdt_object_fid(child)), ldlm_rep);
01400 
01401                 rc = mdt_check_resent_lock(info, child, lhc);
01402                 if (rc < 0) {
01403                         RETURN(rc);
01404                 } else if (rc > 0) {
01405                         mdt_lock_handle_init(lhc);
01406                         mdt_lock_reg_init(lhc, LCK_PR);
01407 
01408                         /*
01409                          * Object's name is on another MDS, no lookup or layout
01410                          * lock is needed here but update lock is.
01411                          */
01412                         child_bits &= ~(MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP |
01413                                         MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT);
01414                         child_bits |= MDS_INODELOCK_PERM | MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE;
01415 
01416                         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, child, lhc, child_bits);
01417                         if (rc < 0)
01418                                 RETURN(rc);
01419                 }
01420 
01421                 /* Finally, we can get attr for child. */
01422                 if (!mdt_object_exists(child)) {
01423                         LU_OBJECT_DEBUG(D_INFO, info->mti_env,
01424                                         &child->mot_obj,
01425                                         "remote object doesn't exist.");
01426                         mdt_object_unlock(info, child, lhc, 1);
01427                         RETURN(-ENOENT);
01428                 }
01429 
01430                 rc = mdt_getattr_internal(info, child, 0);
01431                 if (unlikely(rc != 0))
01432                         mdt_object_unlock(info, child, lhc, 1);
01433 
01434                 RETURN(rc);
01435         }
01436 
01437         lname = &info->mti_name;
01438         mdt_name_unpack(info->mti_pill, &RMF_NAME, lname, MNF_FIX_ANON);
01439 
01440         if (lu_name_is_valid(lname)) {
01441                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "getattr with lock for "DFID"/"DNAME", "
01442                        "ldlm_rep = %p\n", PFID(mdt_object_fid(parent)),
01443                        PNAME(lname), ldlm_rep);
01444         } else {
01445                 reqbody = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01446                 if (unlikely(reqbody == NULL))
01447                         RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
01448 
01449                 *child_fid = reqbody->mbo_fid2;
01450 
01451                 if (unlikely(!fid_is_sane(child_fid)))
01452                         RETURN(err_serious(-EINVAL));
01453 
01454                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "getattr with lock for "DFID"/"DFID", "
01455                        "ldlm_rep = %p\n",
01456                        PFID(mdt_object_fid(parent)),
01457                        PFID(&reqbody->mbo_fid2), ldlm_rep);
01458         }
01459 
01460         mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_LOOKUP_EXECD);
01461 
01462         if (unlikely(!mdt_object_exists(parent)) && lu_name_is_valid(lname)) {
01463                 LU_OBJECT_DEBUG(D_INODE, info->mti_env,
01464                                 &parent->mot_obj,
01465                                 "Parent doesn't exist!");
01466                 RETURN(-ESTALE);
01467         }
01468 
01469         if (mdt_object_remote(parent)) {
01470                 CERROR("%s: parent "DFID" is on remote target\n",
01471                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01472                        PFID(mdt_object_fid(parent)));
01473                 RETURN(-EIO);
01474         }
01475 
01476         if (lu_name_is_valid(lname)) {
01477                 /* Always allow to lookup ".." */
01478                 if (unlikely(lname->ln_namelen == 2 &&
01479                              lname->ln_name[0] == '.' &&
01480                              lname->ln_name[1] == '.'))
01481                         info->mti_spec.sp_permitted = 1;
01482 
01483                 if (info->mti_body->mbo_valid == OBD_MD_FLID) {
01484                         rc = mdt_raw_lookup(info, parent, lname, ldlm_rep);
01485 
01486                         RETURN(rc);
01487                 }
01488 
01489                 /* step 1: lock parent only if parent is a directory */
01490                 if (S_ISDIR(lu_object_attr(&parent->mot_obj))) {
01491                         lhp = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_PARENT];
01492                         mdt_lock_pdo_init(lhp, LCK_PR, lname);
01493                         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, parent, lhp,
01494                                              MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE);
01495                         if (unlikely(rc != 0))
01496                                 RETURN(rc);
01497                 }
01498 
01499                 /* step 2: lookup child's fid by name */
01500                 fid_zero(child_fid);
01501                 rc = mdo_lookup(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(parent), lname,
01502                                 child_fid, &info->mti_spec);
01503                 if (rc == -ENOENT)
01504                         mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_LOOKUP_NEG);
01505 
01506                 if (rc != 0)
01507                         GOTO(out_parent, rc);
01508         }
01509 
01510         mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_LOOKUP_POS);
01511 
01512         /*
01513          *step 3: find the child object by fid & lock it.
01514          *        regardless if it is local or remote.
01515          *
01516          *Note: LU-3240 (commit 762f2114d282a98ebfa4dbbeea9298a8088ad24e)
01517          *      set parent dir fid the same as child fid in getattr by fid case
01518          *      we should not lu_object_find() the object again, could lead
01519          *      to hung if there is a concurrent unlink destroyed the object.
01520          */
01521         if (lu_fid_eq(mdt_object_fid(parent), child_fid)) {
01522                 mdt_object_get(info->mti_env, parent);
01523                 child = parent;
01524         } else {
01525                 child = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt,
01526                                         child_fid);
01527         }
01528 
01529         if (unlikely(IS_ERR(child)))
01530                 GOTO(out_parent, rc = PTR_ERR(child));
01531 
01532         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_RESEND, obd_timeout * 2);
01533         if (!mdt_object_exists(child)) {
01534                 LU_OBJECT_DEBUG(D_INODE, info->mti_env,
01535                                 &child->mot_obj,
01536                                 "Object doesn't exist!");
01537                 GOTO(out_child, rc = -ENOENT);
01538         }
01539 
01540         rc = mdt_check_resent_lock(info, child, lhc);
01541         if (rc < 0) {
01542                 GOTO(out_child, rc);
01543         } else if (rc > 0) {
01544                 mdt_lock_handle_init(lhc);
01545                 mdt_lock_reg_init(lhc, LCK_PR);
01546                 try_layout = false;
01547 
01548                 if (!(child_bits & MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE) &&
01549                       mdt_object_exists(child) && !mdt_object_remote(child)) {
01550                         struct md_attr *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01551 
01552                         ma->ma_valid = 0;
01553                         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
01554                         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, child, ma);
01555                         if (unlikely(rc != 0))
01556                                 GOTO(out_child, rc);
01557 
01558                         /* If the file has not been changed for some time, we
01559                          * return not only a LOOKUP lock, but also an UPDATE
01560                          * lock and this might save us RPC on later STAT. For
01561                          * directories, it also let negative dentry cache start
01562                          * working for this dir. */
01563                         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE &&
01564                             ma->ma_attr.la_valid & LA_CTIME &&
01565                             info->mti_mdt->mdt_namespace->ns_ctime_age_limit +
01566                                 ma->ma_attr.la_ctime < cfs_time_current_sec())
01567                                 child_bits |= MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE;
01568                 }
01569 
01570                 /* layout lock must be granted in a best-effort way
01571                  * for IT operations */
01572                 LASSERT(!(child_bits & MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT));
01573                 if (!OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_NO_LL_GETATTR) &&
01574                     exp_connect_layout(info->mti_exp) &&
01575                     S_ISREG(lu_object_attr(&child->mot_obj)) &&
01576                     !mdt_object_remote(child) && ldlm_rep != NULL) {
01577                         /* try to grant layout lock for regular file. */
01578                         try_layout = true;
01579                 }
01580 
01581                 rc = 0;
01582                 if (try_layout) {
01583                         child_bits |= MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT;
01584                         /* try layout lock, it may fail to be granted due to
01585                          * contention at LOOKUP or UPDATE */
01586                         if (!mdt_object_lock_try(info, child, lhc,
01587                                                  child_bits)) {
01588                                 child_bits &= ~MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT;
01589                                 LASSERT(child_bits != 0);
01590                                 rc = mdt_object_lock(info, child, lhc,
01591                                                      child_bits);
01592                         } else {
01593                                 ma_need |= MA_LOV;
01594                         }
01595                 } else {
01596                         /* Do not enqueue the UPDATE lock from MDT(cross-MDT),
01597                          * client will enqueue the lock to the remote MDT */
01598                         if (mdt_object_remote(child))
01599                                 child_bits &= ~MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE;
01600                         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, child, lhc, child_bits);
01601                 }
01602                 if (unlikely(rc != 0))
01603                         GOTO(out_child, rc);
01604         }
01605 
01606         lock = ldlm_handle2lock(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh);
01607 
01608         /* finally, we can get attr for child. */
01609         rc = mdt_getattr_internal(info, child, ma_need);
01610         if (unlikely(rc != 0)) {
01611                 mdt_object_unlock(info, child, lhc, 1);
01612         } else if (lock) {
01613                 /* Debugging code. */
01614                 LDLM_DEBUG(lock, "Returning lock to client");
01615                 LASSERTF(fid_res_name_eq(mdt_object_fid(child),
01616                                          &lock->l_resource->lr_name),
01617                          "Lock res_id: "DLDLMRES", fid: "DFID"\n",
01618                          PLDLMRES(lock->l_resource),
01619                          PFID(mdt_object_fid(child)));
01620         }
01621         if (lock)
01622                 LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
01623 
01624         EXIT;
01625 out_child:
01626         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, child);
01627 out_parent:
01628         if (lhp)
01629                 mdt_object_unlock(info, parent, lhp, 1);
01630         return rc;
01631 }
01632 
01633 /* normal handler: should release the child lock */
01634 static int mdt_getattr_name(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01635 {
01636         struct mdt_thread_info  *info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
01637         struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_CHILD];
01638         struct mdt_body        *reqbody;
01639         struct mdt_body        *repbody;
01640         int rc, rc2;
01641         ENTRY;
01642 
01643         reqbody = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01644         LASSERT(reqbody != NULL);
01645         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01646         LASSERT(repbody != NULL);
01647 
01648         info->mti_cross_ref = !!(reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLCROSSREF);
01649         repbody->mbo_eadatasize = 0;
01650         repbody->mbo_aclsize = 0;
01651 
01652         rc = mdt_init_ucred_intent_getattr(info, reqbody);
01653         if (unlikely(rc))
01654                 GOTO(out_shrink, rc);
01655 
01656         rc = mdt_getattr_name_lock(info, lhc, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, NULL);
01657         if (lustre_handle_is_used(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh)) {
01658                 ldlm_lock_decref(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh, lhc->mlh_reg_mode);
01659                 lhc->mlh_reg_lh.cookie = 0;
01660         }
01661         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
01662         EXIT;
01663 out_shrink:
01664         mdt_client_compatibility(info);
01665         rc2 = mdt_fix_reply(info);
01666         if (rc == 0)
01667                 rc = rc2;
01668         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
01669         return rc;
01670 }
01671 
01672 static int mdt_iocontrol(unsigned int cmd, struct obd_export *exp, int len,
01673                          void *karg, void __user *uarg);
01674 
01675 static int mdt_set_info(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01676 {
01677         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
01678         char                    *key;
01679         void                    *val;
01680         int                      keylen, vallen, rc = 0;
01681 
01682         ENTRY;
01683 
01684         key = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_SETINFO_KEY);
01685         if (key == NULL) {
01686                 DEBUG_REQ(D_HA, req, "no set_info key");
01687                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
01688         }
01689 
01690         keylen = req_capsule_get_size(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_SETINFO_KEY,
01691                                       RCL_CLIENT);
01692 
01693         val = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_SETINFO_VAL);
01694         if (val == NULL) {
01695                 DEBUG_REQ(D_HA, req, "no set_info val");
01696                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
01697         }
01698 
01699         vallen = req_capsule_get_size(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_SETINFO_VAL,
01700                                       RCL_CLIENT);
01701 
01702         /* Swab any part of val you need to here */
01703         if (KEY_IS(KEY_READ_ONLY)) {
01704                 spin_lock(&req->rq_export->exp_lock);
01705                 if (*(__u32 *)val)
01706                         *exp_connect_flags_ptr(req->rq_export) |=
01707                                 OBD_CONNECT_RDONLY;
01708                 else
01709                         *exp_connect_flags_ptr(req->rq_export) &=
01710                                 ~OBD_CONNECT_RDONLY;
01711                 spin_unlock(&req->rq_export->exp_lock);
01712         } else if (KEY_IS(KEY_CHANGELOG_CLEAR)) {
01713                 struct changelog_setinfo *cs = val;
01714 
01715                 if (vallen != sizeof(*cs)) {
01716                         CERROR("%s: bad changelog_clear setinfo size %d\n",
01717                                tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), vallen);
01718                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
01719                 }
01720                 if (ptlrpc_req_need_swab(req)) {
01721                         __swab64s(&cs->cs_recno);
01722                         __swab32s(&cs->cs_id);
01723                 }
01724 
01725                 rc = mdt_iocontrol(OBD_IOC_CHANGELOG_CLEAR, req->rq_export,
01726                                    vallen, val, NULL);
01727         } else if (KEY_IS(KEY_EVICT_BY_NID)) {
01728                 if (vallen > 0)
01729                         obd_export_evict_by_nid(req->rq_export->exp_obd, val);
01730         } else {
01731                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
01732         }
01733         RETURN(rc);
01734 }
01735 
01736 static int mdt_readpage(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01737 {
01738         struct mdt_thread_info  *info = mdt_th_info(tsi->tsi_env);
01739         struct mdt_object       *object = mdt_obj(tsi->tsi_corpus);
01740         struct lu_rdpg          *rdpg = &info->mti_u.rdpg.mti_rdpg;
01741         const struct mdt_body   *reqbody = tsi->tsi_mdt_body;
01742         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
01743         int                      rc;
01744         int                      i;
01745 
01746         ENTRY;
01747 
01748         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_READPAGE_PACK))
01749                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
01750 
01751         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01752         if (repbody == NULL || reqbody == NULL)
01753                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
01754 
01755         /*
01756          * prepare @rdpg before calling lower layers and transfer itself. Here
01757          * reqbody->size contains offset of where to start to read and
01758          * reqbody->nlink contains number bytes to read.
01759          */
01760         rdpg->rp_hash = reqbody->mbo_size;
01761         if (rdpg->rp_hash != reqbody->mbo_size) {
01762                 CERROR("Invalid hash: "LPX64" != "LPX64"\n",
01763                        rdpg->rp_hash, reqbody->mbo_size);
01764                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01765         }
01766 
01767         rdpg->rp_attrs = reqbody->mbo_mode;
01768         if (exp_connect_flags(tsi->tsi_exp) & OBD_CONNECT_64BITHASH)
01769                 rdpg->rp_attrs |= LUDA_64BITHASH;
01770         rdpg->rp_count  = min_t(unsigned int, reqbody->mbo_nlink,
01771                                 exp_max_brw_size(tsi->tsi_exp));
01772         rdpg->rp_npages = (rdpg->rp_count + PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 1) >>
01773                           PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
01774         OBD_ALLOC(rdpg->rp_pages, rdpg->rp_npages * sizeof rdpg->rp_pages[0]);
01775         if (rdpg->rp_pages == NULL)
01776                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01777 
01778         for (i = 0; i < rdpg->rp_npages; ++i) {
01779                 rdpg->rp_pages[i] = alloc_page(GFP_IOFS);
01780                 if (rdpg->rp_pages[i] == NULL)
01781                         GOTO(free_rdpg, rc = -ENOMEM);
01782         }
01783 
01784         /* call lower layers to fill allocated pages with directory data */
01785         rc = mo_readpage(tsi->tsi_env, mdt_object_child(object), rdpg);
01786         if (rc < 0)
01787                 GOTO(free_rdpg, rc);
01788 
01789         /* send pages to client */
01790         rc = tgt_sendpage(tsi, rdpg, rc);
01791 
01792         EXIT;
01793 free_rdpg:
01794 
01795         for (i = 0; i < rdpg->rp_npages; i++)
01796                 if (rdpg->rp_pages[i] != NULL)
01797                         __free_page(rdpg->rp_pages[i]);
01798         OBD_FREE(rdpg->rp_pages, rdpg->rp_npages * sizeof rdpg->rp_pages[0]);
01799 
01800         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_SENDPAGE))
01801                 RETURN(0);
01802 
01803         return rc;
01804 }
01805 
01806 static int mdt_reint_internal(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01807                               struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc,
01808                               __u32 op)
01809 {
01810         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
01811         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
01812         int                      rc = 0, rc2;
01813 
01814         ENTRY;
01815 
01816         rc = mdt_reint_unpack(info, op);
01817         if (rc != 0) {
01818                 CERROR("Can't unpack reint, rc %d\n", rc);
01819                 RETURN(err_serious(rc));
01820         }
01821 
01822         /* for replay (no_create) lmm is not needed, client has it already */
01823         if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER))
01824                 req_capsule_set_size(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER,
01825                                      DEF_REP_MD_SIZE);
01826 
01827         /* llog cookies are always 0, the field is kept for compatibility */
01828         if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_LOGCOOKIES, RCL_SERVER))
01829                 req_capsule_set_size(pill, &RMF_LOGCOOKIES, RCL_SERVER, 0);
01830 
01831         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(pill);
01832         if (rc != 0) {
01833                 CERROR("Can't pack response, rc %d\n", rc);
01834                 RETURN(err_serious(rc));
01835         }
01836 
01837         if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY, RCL_SERVER)) {
01838                 repbody = req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01839                 LASSERT(repbody);
01840                 repbody->mbo_eadatasize = 0;
01841                 repbody->mbo_aclsize = 0;
01842         }
01843 
01844         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_DELAY, 10);
01845 
01846         /* for replay no cookkie / lmm need, because client have this already */
01847         if (info->mti_spec.no_create)
01848                 if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER))
01849                         req_capsule_set_size(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER, 0);
01850 
01851         rc = mdt_init_ucred_reint(info);
01852         if (rc)
01853                 GOTO(out_shrink, rc);
01854 
01855         rc = mdt_fix_attr_ucred(info, op);
01856         if (rc != 0)
01857                 GOTO(out_ucred, rc = err_serious(rc));
01858 
01859         rc = mdt_check_resent(info, mdt_reconstruct, lhc);
01860         if (rc < 0) {
01861                 GOTO(out_ucred, rc);
01862         } else if (rc == 1) {
01863                 DEBUG_REQ(D_INODE, mdt_info_req(info), "resent opt.");
01864                 rc = lustre_msg_get_status(mdt_info_req(info)->rq_repmsg);
01865                 GOTO(out_ucred, rc);
01866         }
01867         rc = mdt_reint_rec(info, lhc);
01868         EXIT;
01869 out_ucred:
01870         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
01871 out_shrink:
01872         mdt_client_compatibility(info);
01873         rc2 = mdt_fix_reply(info);
01874         if (rc == 0)
01875                 rc = rc2;
01876         return rc;
01877 }
01878 
01879 static long mdt_reint_opcode(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
01880                              const struct req_format **fmt)
01881 {
01882         struct mdt_device       *mdt;
01883         struct mdt_rec_reint    *rec;
01884         long                     opc;
01885 
01886         rec = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
01887         if (rec != NULL) {
01888                 opc = rec->rr_opcode;
01889                 DEBUG_REQ(D_INODE, req, "reint opt = %ld", opc);
01890                 if (opc < REINT_MAX && fmt[opc] != NULL)
01891                         req_capsule_extend(&req->rq_pill, fmt[opc]);
01892                 else {
01893                         mdt = mdt_exp2dev(req->rq_export);
01894                         CERROR("%s: Unsupported opcode '%ld' from client '%s':"
01895                                " rc = %d\n", req->rq_export->exp_obd->obd_name,
01896                                opc, mdt->mdt_ldlm_client->cli_name, -EFAULT);
01897                         opc = err_serious(-EFAULT);
01898                 }
01899         } else {
01900                 opc = err_serious(-EFAULT);
01901         }
01902         return opc;
01903 }
01904 
01905 static int mdt_reint(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01906 {
01907         long opc;
01908         int  rc;
01909         static const struct req_format *reint_fmts[REINT_MAX] = {
01910                 [REINT_SETATTR]  = &RQF_MDS_REINT_SETATTR,
01911                 [REINT_CREATE]   = &RQF_MDS_REINT_CREATE,
01912                 [REINT_LINK]     = &RQF_MDS_REINT_LINK,
01913                 [REINT_UNLINK]   = &RQF_MDS_REINT_UNLINK,
01914                 [REINT_RENAME]   = &RQF_MDS_REINT_RENAME,
01915                 [REINT_OPEN]     = &RQF_MDS_REINT_OPEN,
01916                 [REINT_SETXATTR] = &RQF_MDS_REINT_SETXATTR,
01917                 [REINT_RMENTRY]  = &RQF_MDS_REINT_UNLINK,
01918                 [REINT_MIGRATE]  = &RQF_MDS_REINT_RENAME
01919         };
01920 
01921         ENTRY;
01922 
01923         opc = mdt_reint_opcode(tgt_ses_req(tsi), reint_fmts);
01924         if (opc >= 0) {
01925                 struct mdt_thread_info *info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
01926                 /*
01927                  * No lock possible here from client to pass it to reint code
01928                  * path.
01929                  */
01930                 rc = mdt_reint_internal(info, NULL, opc);
01931                 mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
01932         } else {
01933                 rc = opc;
01934         }
01935 
01936         tsi->tsi_reply_fail_id = OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_NET_REP;
