01937         RETURN(rc);
01938 }
01939 
01940 /* this should sync the whole device */
01941 static int mdt_device_sync(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *mdt)
01942 {
01943         struct dt_device *dt = mdt->mdt_bottom;
01944         int rc;
01945         ENTRY;
01946 
01947         rc = dt->dd_ops->dt_sync(env, dt);
01948         RETURN(rc);
01949 }
01950 
01951 /* this should sync this object */
01952 static int mdt_object_sync(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01953 {
01954         struct md_object *next;
01955         int rc;
01956         ENTRY;
01957 
01958         if (!mdt_object_exists(info->mti_object)) {
01959                 CWARN("%s: non existing object "DFID": rc = %d\n",
01960                       mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01961                       PFID(mdt_object_fid(info->mti_object)), -ESTALE);
01962                 RETURN(-ESTALE);
01963         }
01964         next = mdt_object_child(info->mti_object);
01965         rc = mo_object_sync(info->mti_env, next);
01966 
01967         RETURN(rc);
01968 }
01969 
01970 static int mdt_sync(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01971 {
01972         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
01973         struct req_capsule      *pill = tsi->tsi_pill;
01974         struct mdt_body         *body;
01975         int                      rc;
01976 
01977         ENTRY;
01978 
01979         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_SYNC_PACK))
01980                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
01981 
01982         if (fid_seq(&tsi->tsi_mdt_body->mbo_fid1) == 0) {
01983                 rc = mdt_device_sync(tsi->tsi_env, mdt_exp2dev(tsi->tsi_exp));
01984         } else {
01985                 struct mdt_thread_info *info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
01986 
01987                 /* sync an object */
01988                 rc = mdt_object_sync(info);
01989                 if (rc == 0) {
01990                         const struct lu_fid *fid;
01991                         struct lu_attr *la = &info->mti_attr.ma_attr;
01992 
01993                         info->mti_attr.ma_need = MA_INODE;
01994                         info->mti_attr.ma_valid = 0;
01995                         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, info->mti_object,
01996                                                   &info->mti_attr);
01997                         if (rc == 0) {
01998                                 body = req_capsule_server_get(pill,
01999                                                               &RMF_MDT_BODY);
02000                                 fid = mdt_object_fid(info->mti_object);
02001                                 mdt_pack_attr2body(info, body, la, fid);
02002                         }
02003                 }
02004                 mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
02005         }
02006         if (rc == 0)
02007                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_SYNC);
02008 
02009         RETURN(rc);
02010 }
02011 
02012 /*
02013  * Handle quota control requests to consult current usage/limit, but also
02014  * to configure quota enforcement
02015  */
02016 static int mdt_quotactl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02017 {
02018         struct obd_export       *exp  = tsi->tsi_exp;
02019         struct req_capsule      *pill = tsi->tsi_pill;
02020         struct obd_quotactl     *oqctl, *repoqc;
02021         int                      id, rc;
02022         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mdt_exp2dev(exp);
02023         struct lu_device        *qmt = mdt->mdt_qmt_dev;
02024         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
02025         ENTRY;
02026 
02027         oqctl = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_OBD_QUOTACTL);
02028         if (oqctl == NULL)
02029                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02030 
02031         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(pill);
02032         if (rc)
02033                 RETURN(err_serious(rc));
02034 
02035         switch (oqctl->qc_cmd) {
02036                 /* master quotactl */
02037         case Q_SETINFO:
02038         case Q_SETQUOTA:
02039                 if (!nodemap_can_setquota(nodemap))
02040                         RETURN(-EPERM);
02041         case Q_GETINFO:
02042         case Q_GETQUOTA:
02043                 if (qmt == NULL)
02044                         RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
02045                 /* slave quotactl */
02046         case Q_GETOINFO:
02047         case Q_GETOQUOTA:
02048                 break;
02049         default:
02050                 CERROR("Unsupported quotactl command: %d\n", oqctl->qc_cmd);
02051                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
02052         }
02053 
02054         /* map uid/gid for remote client */
02055         id = oqctl->qc_id;
02056         if (exp_connect_rmtclient(exp)) {
02057                 struct lustre_idmap_table *idmap;
02058 
02059                 idmap = exp->exp_mdt_data.med_idmap;
02060 
02061                 if (unlikely(oqctl->qc_cmd != Q_GETQUOTA &&
02062                              oqctl->qc_cmd != Q_GETINFO))
02063                         RETURN(-EPERM);
02064 
02065                 if (oqctl->qc_type == USRQUOTA)
02066                         id = lustre_idmap_lookup_uid(NULL, idmap, 0,
02067                                                      oqctl->qc_id);
02068                 else if (oqctl->qc_type == GRPQUOTA)
02069                         id = lustre_idmap_lookup_gid(NULL, idmap, 0,
02070                                                      oqctl->qc_id);
02071                 else
02072                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
02073 
02074                 if (id == CFS_IDMAP_NOTFOUND) {
02075                         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "no mapping for id %u\n", oqctl->qc_id);
02076                         RETURN(-EACCES);
02077                 }
02078         }
02079 
02080         if (oqctl->qc_type == USRQUOTA)
02081                 id = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_UID,
02082                                     NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, id);
02083         else if (oqctl->qc_type == GRPQUOTA)
02084                 id = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_UID,
02085                                     NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, id);
02086 
02087         repoqc = req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_OBD_QUOTACTL);
02088         if (repoqc == NULL)
02089                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
02090 
02091         if (oqctl->qc_id != id)
02092                 swap(oqctl->qc_id, id);
02093 
02094         switch (oqctl->qc_cmd) {
02095 
02096         case Q_GETINFO:
02097         case Q_SETINFO:
02098         case Q_SETQUOTA:
02099         case Q_GETQUOTA:
02100                 /* forward quotactl request to QMT */
02101                 rc = qmt_hdls.qmth_quotactl(tsi->tsi_env, qmt, oqctl);
02102                 break;
02103 
02104         case Q_GETOINFO:
02105         case Q_GETOQUOTA:
02106                 /* slave quotactl */
02107                 rc = lquotactl_slv(tsi->tsi_env, tsi->tsi_tgt->lut_bottom,
02108                                    oqctl);
02109                 break;
02110 
02111         default:
02112                 CERROR("Unsupported quotactl command: %d\n", oqctl->qc_cmd);
02113                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
02114         }
02115 
02116         if (oqctl->qc_id != id)
02117                 swap(oqctl->qc_id, id);
02118 
02119         *repoqc = *oqctl;
02120         RETURN(rc);
02121 }
02122 
02131 static int mdt_llog_ctxt_clone(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *mdt,
02132                                int idx)
02133 {
02134         struct md_device  *next = mdt->mdt_child;
02135         struct llog_ctxt *ctxt;
02136         int rc;
02137 
02138         if (!llog_ctxt_null(mdt2obd_dev(mdt), idx))
02139                 return 0;
02140 
02141         rc = next->md_ops->mdo_llog_ctxt_get(env, next, idx, (void **)&ctxt);
02142         if (rc || ctxt == NULL) {
02143                 return 0;
02144         }
02145 
02146         rc = llog_group_set_ctxt(&mdt2obd_dev(mdt)->obd_olg, ctxt, idx);
02147         if (rc)
02148                 CERROR("Can't set mdt ctxt %d\n", rc);
02149 
02150         return rc;
02151 }
02152 
02153 static int mdt_llog_ctxt_unclone(const struct lu_env *env,
02154                                  struct mdt_device *mdt, int idx)
02155 {
02156         struct llog_ctxt *ctxt;
02157 
02158         ctxt = llog_get_context(mdt2obd_dev(mdt), idx);
02159         if (ctxt == NULL)
02160                 return 0;
02161         /* Put once for the get we just did, and once for the clone */
02162         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
02163         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
02164         return 0;
02165 }
02166 
02167 /*
02168  * sec context handlers
02169  */
02170 static int mdt_sec_ctx_handle(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02171 {
02172         int rc;
02173 
02174         rc = mdt_handle_idmap(tsi);
02175         if (unlikely(rc)) {
02176                 struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
02177                 __u32                    opc;
02178 
02179                 opc = lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg);
02180                 if (opc == SEC_CTX_INIT || opc == SEC_CTX_INIT_CONT)
02181                         sptlrpc_svc_ctx_invalidate(req);
02182         }
02183 
02184         CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_SEC_CTX_HDL_PAUSE, cfs_fail_val);
02185 
02186         return rc;
02187 }
02188 
02189 /*
02190  * quota request handlers
02191  */
02192 static int mdt_quota_dqacq(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02193 {
02194         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mdt_exp2dev(tsi->tsi_exp);
02195         struct lu_device        *qmt = mdt->mdt_qmt_dev;
02196         int                      rc;
02197         ENTRY;
02198 
02199         if (qmt == NULL)
02200                 RETURN(err_serious(-EOPNOTSUPP));
02201 
02202         rc = qmt_hdls.qmth_dqacq(tsi->tsi_env, qmt, tgt_ses_req(tsi));
02203         RETURN(rc);
02204 }
02205 
02206 struct mdt_object *mdt_object_new(const struct lu_env *env,
02207                                   struct mdt_device *d,
02208                                   const struct lu_fid *f)
02209 {
02210         struct lu_object_conf conf = { .loc_flags = LOC_F_NEW };
02211         struct lu_object *o;
02212         struct mdt_object *m;
02213         ENTRY;
02214 
02215         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Allocate object for "DFID"\n", PFID(f));
02216         o = lu_object_find(env, &d->mdt_lu_dev, f, &conf);
02217         if (unlikely(IS_ERR(o)))
02218                 m = (struct mdt_object *)o;
02219         else
02220                 m = mdt_obj(o);
02221         RETURN(m);
02222 }
02223 
02224 struct mdt_object *mdt_object_find(const struct lu_env *env,
02225                                    struct mdt_device *d,
02226                                    const struct lu_fid *f)
02227 {
02228         struct lu_object *o;
02229         struct mdt_object *m;
02230         ENTRY;
02231 
02232         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Find object for "DFID"\n", PFID(f));
02233         o = lu_object_find(env, &d->mdt_lu_dev, f, NULL);
02234         if (unlikely(IS_ERR(o)))
02235                 m = (struct mdt_object *)o;
02236         else
02237                 m = mdt_obj(o);
02238 
02239         RETURN(m);
02240 }
02241 
02250 static void mdt_device_commit_async(const struct lu_env *env,
02251                                     struct mdt_device *mdt)
02252 {
02253         struct dt_device *dt = mdt->mdt_bottom;
02254         int rc;
02255         ENTRY;
02256 
02257         rc = dt->dd_ops->dt_commit_async(env, dt);
02258         if (unlikely(rc != 0))
02259                 CWARN("%s: async commit start failed: rc = %d\n",
02260                       mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
02261         atomic_inc(&mdt->mdt_async_commit_count);
02262         EXIT;
02263 }
02264 
02275 static inline void mdt_set_lock_sync(struct ldlm_lock *lock)
02276 {
02277         lock->l_ast_data = (void*)1;
02278 }
02279 
02290 static inline int mdt_is_lock_sync(struct ldlm_lock *lock)
02291 {
02292         return lock->l_ast_data != NULL;
02293 }
02294 
02308 int mdt_blocking_ast(struct ldlm_lock *lock, struct ldlm_lock_desc *desc,
02309                      void *data, int flag)
02310 {
02311         struct obd_device *obd = ldlm_lock_to_ns(lock)->ns_obd;
02312         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
02313         int rc;
02314         ENTRY;
02315 
02316         if (flag == LDLM_CB_CANCELING)
02317                 RETURN(0);
02318 
02319         lock_res_and_lock(lock);
02320         if (lock->l_blocking_ast != mdt_blocking_ast) {
02321                 unlock_res_and_lock(lock);
02322                 RETURN(0);
02323         }
02324         if (lock->l_req_mode & (LCK_PW | LCK_EX) &&
02325             lock->l_blocking_lock != NULL) {
02326                 if (mdt_cos_is_enabled(mdt) &&
02327                     lock->l_client_cookie !=
02328                     lock->l_blocking_lock->l_client_cookie)
02329                         mdt_set_lock_sync(lock);
02330                 else if (mdt_slc_is_enabled(mdt) &&
02331                          ldlm_is_cos_incompat(lock->l_blocking_lock))
02332                         mdt_set_lock_sync(lock);
02333         }
02334         rc = ldlm_blocking_ast_nocheck(lock);
02335 
02336         /* There is no lock conflict if l_blocking_lock == NULL,
02337          * it indicates a blocking ast sent from ldlm_lock_decref_internal
02338          * when the last reference to a local lock was released */
02339         if (lock->l_req_mode == LCK_COS && lock->l_blocking_lock != NULL) {
02340                 struct lu_env env;
02341 
02342                 rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_LOCAL);
02343                 if (unlikely(rc != 0))
02344                         CWARN("%s: lu_env initialization failed, cannot "
02345                               "start asynchronous commit: rc = %d\n",
02346                               obd->obd_name, rc);
02347                 else
02348                         mdt_device_commit_async(&env, mdt);
02349                 lu_env_fini(&env);
02350         }
02351         RETURN(rc);
02352 }
02353 
02354 /*
02355  * Blocking AST for cross-MDT lock
02356  *
02357  * Discard lock from uncommitted_slc_locks and cancel it.
02358  *
02359  * \param lock  the lock which blocks a request or cancelling lock
02360  * \param desc  unused
02361  * \param data  unused
02362  * \param flag  indicates whether this cancelling or blocking callback
02363  * \retval      0 on success
02364  * \retval      negative number on error
02365  */
02366 int mdt_remote_blocking_ast(struct ldlm_lock *lock, struct ldlm_lock_desc *desc,
02367                             void *data, int flag)
02368 {
02369         struct lustre_handle lockh;
02370         int               rc;
02371         ENTRY;
02372 
02373         switch (flag) {
02374         case LDLM_CB_BLOCKING:
02375                 ldlm_lock2handle(lock, &lockh);
02376                 rc = ldlm_cli_cancel(&lockh,
02377                         ldlm_is_atomic_cb(lock) ? 0 : LCF_ASYNC);
02378                 if (rc < 0) {
02379                         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "ldlm_cli_cancel: %d\n", rc);
02380                         RETURN(rc);
02381                 }
02382                 break;
02383         case LDLM_CB_CANCELING:
02384                 LDLM_DEBUG(lock, "Revoke remote lock");
02385                 /* discard slc lock here so that it can be cleaned anytime,
02386                  * especially for cleanup_resource() */
02387                 tgt_discard_slc_lock(lock);
02388                 break;
02389         default:
02390                 LBUG();
02391         }
02392 
02393         RETURN(0);
02394 }
02395 
02396 int mdt_check_resent_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
02397                           struct mdt_object *mo,
02398                           struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
02399 {
02400         /* the lock might already be gotten in ldlm_handle_enqueue() */
02401         if (unlikely(lustre_handle_is_used(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh))) {
02402                 struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(info);
02403                 struct ldlm_lock      *lock;
02404 
02405                 lock = ldlm_handle2lock(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh);
02406                 LASSERT(lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & MSG_RESENT);
02407                 if (lock == NULL) {
02408                         /* Lock is pinned by ldlm_handle_enqueue0() as it is
02409                          * a resend case, however, it could be already destroyed
02410                          * due to client eviction or a raced cancel RPC. */
02411                         LDLM_DEBUG_NOLOCK("Invalid lock handle "LPX64,
02412                                           lhc->mlh_reg_lh.cookie);
02413                         RETURN(-ESTALE);
02414                 }
02415 
02416                 if (!fid_res_name_eq(mdt_object_fid(mo),
02417                                      &lock->l_resource->lr_name)) {
02418                         CWARN("%s: Although resent, but still not "
02419                               "get child lock:"DFID"\n",
02420                               info->mti_exp->exp_obd->obd_name,
02421                               PFID(mdt_object_fid(mo)));
02422                         LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
02423                         RETURN(-EPROTO);
02424                 }
02425                 LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
02426                 return 0;
02427         }
02428         return 1;
02429 }
02430 
02431 int mdt_remote_object_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *mti, struct mdt_object *o,
02432                            const struct lu_fid *fid, struct lustre_handle *lh,
02433                            enum ldlm_mode mode, __u64 ibits, bool nonblock)
02434 {
02435         struct ldlm_enqueue_info *einfo = &mti->mti_einfo;
02436         union ldlm_policy_data *policy = &mti->mti_policy;
02437         struct ldlm_res_id *res_id = &mti->mti_res_id;
02438         int rc = 0;
02439         ENTRY;
02440 
02441         LASSERT(mdt_object_remote(o));
02442 
02443         fid_build_reg_res_name(fid, res_id);
02444 
02445         memset(einfo, 0, sizeof(*einfo));
02446         einfo->ei_type = LDLM_IBITS;
02447         einfo->ei_mode = mode;
02448         einfo->ei_cb_bl = mdt_remote_blocking_ast;
02449         einfo->ei_cb_cp = ldlm_completion_ast;
02450         einfo->ei_enq_slave = 0;
02451         einfo->ei_res_id = res_id;
02452         if (nonblock)
02453                 einfo->ei_nonblock = 1;
02454 
02455         memset(policy, 0, sizeof(*policy));
02456         policy->l_inodebits.bits = ibits;
02457 
02458         rc = mo_object_lock(mti->mti_env, mdt_object_child(o), lh, einfo,
02459                             policy);
02460         RETURN(rc);
02461 }
02462 
02463 static int mdt_object_local_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
02464                                  struct mdt_object *o,
02465                                  struct mdt_lock_handle *lh, __u64 ibits,
02466                                  bool nonblock, bool cos_incompat)
02467 {
02468         struct ldlm_namespace *ns = info->mti_mdt->mdt_namespace;
02469         union ldlm_policy_data *policy = &info->mti_policy;
02470         struct ldlm_res_id *res_id = &info->mti_res_id;
02471         __u64 dlmflags = 0;
02472         int rc;
02473         ENTRY;
02474 
02475         LASSERT(!lustre_handle_is_used(&lh->mlh_reg_lh));
02476         LASSERT(!lustre_handle_is_used(&lh->mlh_pdo_lh));
02477         LASSERT(lh->mlh_reg_mode != LCK_MINMODE);
02478         LASSERT(lh->mlh_type != MDT_NUL_LOCK);
02479 
02480         if (cos_incompat) {
02481                 LASSERT(lh->mlh_reg_mode == LCK_PW ||
02482                         lh->mlh_reg_mode == LCK_EX);
02483                 dlmflags |= LDLM_FL_COS_INCOMPAT;
02484         } else if (mdt_cos_is_enabled(info->mti_mdt)) {
02485                 dlmflags |= LDLM_FL_COS_ENABLED;
02486         }
02487 
02488         /* Only enqueue LOOKUP lock for remote object */
02489         if (mdt_object_remote(o))
02490                 LASSERT(ibits == MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP);
02491 
02492         if (lh->mlh_type == MDT_PDO_LOCK) {
02493                 /* check for exists after object is locked */
02494                 if (mdt_object_exists(o) == 0) {
02495                         /* Non-existent object shouldn't have PDO lock */
02496                         RETURN(-ESTALE);
02497                 } else {
02498                         /* Non-dir object shouldn't have PDO lock */
02499                         if (!S_ISDIR(lu_object_attr(&o->mot_obj)))
02500                                 RETURN(-ENOTDIR);
02501                 }
02502         }
02503 
02504         memset(policy, 0, sizeof(*policy));
02505         fid_build_reg_res_name(mdt_object_fid(o), res_id);
02506 
02507         dlmflags |= LDLM_FL_ATOMIC_CB;
02508         if (nonblock)
02509                 dlmflags |= LDLM_FL_BLOCK_NOWAIT;
02510 
02511         /*
02512          * Take PDO lock on whole directory and build correct @res_id for lock
02513          * on part of directory.
02514          */
02515         if (lh->mlh_pdo_hash != 0) {
02516                 LASSERT(lh->mlh_type == MDT_PDO_LOCK);
02517                 mdt_lock_pdo_mode(info, o, lh);
02518                 if (lh->mlh_pdo_mode != LCK_NL) {
02519                         /*
02520                          * Do not use LDLM_FL_LOCAL_ONLY for parallel lock, it
02521                          * is never going to be sent to client and we do not
02522                          * want it slowed down due to possible cancels.
02523                          */
02524                         policy->l_inodebits.bits = MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE;
02525                         rc = mdt_fid_lock(ns, &lh->mlh_pdo_lh, lh->mlh_pdo_mode,
02526                                           policy, res_id, dlmflags,
02527                                           info->mti_exp == NULL ? NULL :
02528                                           &info->mti_exp->exp_handle.h_cookie);
02529                         if (unlikely(rc != 0))
02530                                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
02531                 }
02532 
02533                 /*
02534                  * Finish res_id initializing by name hash marking part of
02535                  * directory which is taking modification.
02536                  */
02537                 res_id->name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_HSH_OFF] = lh->mlh_pdo_hash;
02538         }
02539 
02540         policy->l_inodebits.bits = ibits;
02541 
02542         /*
02543          * Use LDLM_FL_LOCAL_ONLY for this lock. We do not know yet if it is
02544          * going to be sent to client. If it is - mdt_intent_policy() path will
02545          * fix it up and turn FL_LOCAL flag off.
02546          */
02547         rc = mdt_fid_lock(ns, &lh->mlh_reg_lh, lh->mlh_reg_mode, policy,
02548                           res_id, LDLM_FL_LOCAL_ONLY | dlmflags,
02549                           info->mti_exp == NULL ? NULL :
02550                           &info->mti_exp->exp_handle.h_cookie);
02551 out_unlock:
02552         if (rc != 0)
02553                 mdt_object_unlock(info, o, lh, 1);
02554         else if (unlikely(OBD_FAIL_PRECHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_PDO_LOCK)) &&
02555                    lh->mlh_pdo_hash != 0 &&
02556                    (lh->mlh_reg_mode == LCK_PW || lh->mlh_reg_mode == LCK_EX))
02557                 OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_PDO_LOCK, 15);
02558 
02559         RETURN(rc);
02560 }
02561 
02562 static int
02563 mdt_object_lock_internal(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *o,
02564                          struct mdt_lock_handle *lh, __u64 ibits, bool nonblock,
02565                          bool cos_incompat)
02566 {
02567         struct mdt_lock_handle *local_lh = NULL;
02568         int rc;
02569         ENTRY;
02570 
02571         if (!mdt_object_remote(o)) {
02572                 rc = mdt_object_local_lock(info, o, lh, ibits, nonblock,
02573                                            cos_incompat);
02574                 RETURN(rc);
02575         }
02576 
02577         /* XXX do not support PERM/LAYOUT/XATTR lock for remote object yet */
02578         ibits &= ~(MDS_INODELOCK_PERM | MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT |
02579                    MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR);
02580 
02581         /* Only enqueue LOOKUP lock for remote object */
02582         if (ibits & MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP) {
02583                 rc = mdt_object_local_lock(info, o, lh, MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP,
02584                                            nonblock, cos_incompat);
02585                 if (rc != ELDLM_OK)
02586                         RETURN(rc);
02587 
02588                 local_lh = lh;
02589         }
02590 
02591         if (ibits & MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE) {
02592                 /* Sigh, PDO needs to enqueue 2 locks right now, but
02593                  * enqueue RPC can only request 1 lock, to avoid extra
02594                  * RPC, so it will instead enqueue EX lock for remote
02595                  * object anyway XXX*/
02596                 if (lh->mlh_type == MDT_PDO_LOCK &&
02597                     lh->mlh_pdo_hash != 0) {
02598                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: "DFID" convert PDO lock to"
02599                                "EX lock.\n", mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
02600                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)));
02601                         lh->mlh_pdo_hash = 0;
02602                         lh->mlh_rreg_mode = LCK_EX;
02603                         lh->mlh_type = MDT_REG_LOCK;
02604                 }
02605                 rc = mdt_remote_object_lock(info, o, mdt_object_fid(o),
02606                                             &lh->mlh_rreg_lh,
02607                                             lh->mlh_rreg_mode,
02608                                             MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, nonblock);
02609                 if (rc != ELDLM_OK) {
02610                         if (local_lh != NULL)
02611                                 mdt_object_unlock(info, o, local_lh, rc);
02612                         RETURN(rc);
02613                 }
02614         }
02615 
02616         RETURN(0);
02617 }
02618 
02619 int mdt_object_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *o,
02620                     struct mdt_lock_handle *lh, __u64 ibits)
02621 {
02622         return mdt_object_lock_internal(info, o, lh, ibits, false, false);
02623 }
02624 
02625 int mdt_reint_object_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *o,
02626                           struct mdt_lock_handle *lh, __u64 ibits,
02627                           bool cos_incompat)
02628 {
02629         LASSERT(lh->mlh_reg_mode == LCK_PW || lh->mlh_reg_mode == LCK_EX);
02630         return mdt_object_lock_internal(info, o, lh, ibits, false,
02631                                         cos_incompat);
02632 }
02633 
02634 int mdt_object_lock_try(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *o,
02635                         struct mdt_lock_handle *lh, __u64 ibits)
02636 {
02637         struct mdt_lock_handle tmp = *lh;
02638         int rc;
02639 
02640         rc = mdt_object_lock_internal(info, o, &tmp, ibits, true, false);
02641         if (rc == 0)
02642                 *lh = tmp;
02643 
02644         return rc == 0;
02645 }
02646 
02647 int mdt_reint_object_lock_try(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
02648                               struct mdt_object *o, struct mdt_lock_handle *lh,
02649                               __u64 ibits, bool cos_incompat)
02650 {
02651         struct mdt_lock_handle tmp = *lh;
02652         int rc;
02653 
02654         LASSERT(lh->mlh_reg_mode == LCK_PW || lh->mlh_reg_mode == LCK_EX);
02655         rc = mdt_object_lock_internal(info, o, &tmp, ibits, true, cos_incompat);
02656         if (rc == 0)
02657                 *lh = tmp;
02658 
02659         return rc == 0;
02660 }
02661 
02675 static void mdt_save_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct lustre_handle *h,
02676                           enum ldlm_mode mode, int decref)
02677 {
02678         ENTRY;
02679 
02680         if (lustre_handle_is_used(h)) {
02681                 if (decref || !info->mti_has_trans ||
02682                     !(mode & (LCK_PW | LCK_EX))) {
02683                         mdt_fid_unlock(h, mode);
02684                 } else {
02685                         struct mdt_device *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
02686                         struct ldlm_lock *lock = ldlm_handle2lock(h);
02687                         struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(info);
02688                         int cos;
02689 
02690                         cos = (mdt_cos_is_enabled(mdt) ||
02691                                mdt_slc_is_enabled(mdt));
02692 
02693                         LASSERTF(lock != NULL, "no lock for cookie "LPX64"\n",
02694                                  h->cookie);
02695 
02696                         /* there is no request if mdt_object_unlock() is called
02697                          * from mdt_export_cleanup()->mdt_add_dirty_flag() */
02698                         if (likely(req != NULL)) {
02699                                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "request = %p reply state = %p"
02700                                        " transno = "LPD64"\n", req,
02701                                        req->rq_reply_state, req->rq_transno);
02702                                 if (cos) {
02703                                         ldlm_lock_downgrade(lock, LCK_COS);
02704                                         mode = LCK_COS;
02705                                 }
02706                                 ptlrpc_save_lock(req, h, mode, cos);
02707                         } else {
02708                                 mdt_fid_unlock(h, mode);
02709                         }
02710                         if (mdt_is_lock_sync(lock)) {
02711                                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "found sync-lock,"
02712                                        " async commit started\n");
02713                                 mdt_device_commit_async(info->mti_env,
02714                                                         mdt);
02715                         }
02716                         LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
02717                 }
02718                 h->cookie = 0ull;
02719         }
02720 
02721         EXIT;
02722 }
02723 
02735 static void mdt_save_remote_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
02736                                  struct lustre_handle *h, enum ldlm_mode mode,
02737                                  int decref)
02738 {
02739         ENTRY;
02740 
02741         if (lustre_handle_is_used(h)) {
02742                 if (decref || !info->mti_has_trans ||
02743                     !(mode & (LCK_PW | LCK_EX))) {
02744                         ldlm_lock_decref_and_cancel(h, mode);
02745                 } else {
02746                         struct ldlm_lock *lock = ldlm_handle2lock(h);
02747                         struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(info);
02748 
02749                         LASSERT(req != NULL);
02750                         tgt_save_slc_lock(lock, req->rq_transno);
02751                         ldlm_lock_decref(h, mode);
02752                 }
02753                 h->cookie = 0ull;
02754         }
02755 
02756         EXIT;
02757 }
02758 
02771 void mdt_object_unlock(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *o,
02772                        struct mdt_lock_handle *lh, int decref)
02773 {
02774         ENTRY;
02775 
02776         mdt_save_lock(info, &lh->mlh_pdo_lh, lh->mlh_pdo_mode, decref);
02777         mdt_save_lock(info, &lh->mlh_reg_lh, lh->mlh_reg_mode, decref);
02778         mdt_save_remote_lock(info, &lh->mlh_rreg_lh, lh->mlh_rreg_mode, decref);
02779 
02780         EXIT;
02781 }
02782 
02783 struct mdt_object *mdt_object_find_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
02784                                         const struct lu_fid *f,
02785                                         struct mdt_lock_handle *lh,
02786                                         __u64 ibits)
02787 {
02788         struct mdt_object *o;
02789 
02790         o = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, f);
02791         if (!IS_ERR(o)) {
02792                 int rc;
02793 
02794                 rc = mdt_object_lock(info, o, lh, ibits);
02795                 if (rc != 0) {
02796                         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, o);
02797                         o = ERR_PTR(rc);
02798                 }
02799         }
02800         return o;
02801 }
02802 
02803 void mdt_object_unlock_put(struct mdt_thread_info * info,
02804                            struct mdt_object * o,
02805                            struct mdt_lock_handle *lh,
02806                            int decref)
02807 {
02808         mdt_object_unlock(info, o, lh, decref);
02809         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, o);
02810 }
02811 
02812 /*
02813  * Generic code handling requests that have struct mdt_body passed in:
02814  *
02815  *  - extract mdt_body from request and save it in @info, if present;
02816  *
02817  *  - create lu_object, corresponding to the fid in mdt_body, and save it in
02818  *  @info;
02819  *
02820  *  - if HABEO_CORPUS flag is set for this request type check whether object
02821  *  actually exists on storage (lu_object_exists()).
02822  *
02823  */
02824 static int mdt_body_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info, __u32 flags)
02825 {
02826         const struct mdt_body    *body;
02827         struct mdt_object        *obj;
02828         const struct lu_env      *env;
02829         struct req_capsule       *pill;
02830         int                       rc;
02831         ENTRY;
02832 
02833         env = info->mti_env;
02834         pill = info->mti_pill;
02835 
02836         body = info->mti_body = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
02837         if (body == NULL)
02838                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
02839 
02840         if (!(body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLID))
02841                 RETURN(0);
02842 
02843         if (!fid_is_sane(&body->mbo_fid1)) {
02844                 CERROR("Invalid fid: "DFID"\n", PFID(&body->mbo_fid1));
02845                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
02846         }
02847 
02848         obj = mdt_object_find(env, info->mti_mdt, &body->mbo_fid1);
02849         if (!IS_ERR(obj)) {
02850                 if ((flags & HABEO_CORPUS) && !mdt_object_exists(obj)) {
02851                         mdt_object_put(env, obj);
02852                         rc = -ENOENT;
02853                 } else {
02854                         info->mti_object = obj;
02855                         rc = 0;
02856                 }
02857         } else
02858                 rc = PTR_ERR(obj);
02859 
02860         RETURN(rc);
02861 }
02862 
02863 static int mdt_unpack_req_pack_rep(struct mdt_thread_info *info, __u32 flags)
02864 {
02865         struct req_capsule *pill = info->mti_pill;
02866         int rc;
02867         ENTRY;
02868 
02869         if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY, RCL_CLIENT))
02870                 rc = mdt_body_unpack(info, flags);
02871         else
02872                 rc = 0;
02873 
02874         if (rc == 0 && (flags & HABEO_REFERO)) {
02875                 /* Pack reply. */
02876                 if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER))
02877                         req_capsule_set_size(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER,
02878                                              DEF_REP_MD_SIZE);
02879                 if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_LOGCOOKIES, RCL_SERVER))
02880                         req_capsule_set_size(pill, &RMF_LOGCOOKIES,
02881                                              RCL_SERVER, 0);
02882 
02883                 rc = req_capsule_server_pack(pill);
02884         }
02885         RETURN(rc);
02886 }
02887 
02888 void mdt_lock_handle_init(struct mdt_lock_handle *lh)
02889 {
02890         lh->mlh_type = MDT_NUL_LOCK;
02891         lh->mlh_reg_lh.cookie = 0ull;
02892         lh->mlh_reg_mode = LCK_MINMODE;
02893         lh->mlh_pdo_lh.cookie = 0ull;
02894         lh->mlh_pdo_mode = LCK_MINMODE;
02895         lh->mlh_rreg_lh.cookie = 0ull;
02896         lh->mlh_rreg_mode = LCK_MINMODE;
02897 }
02898 
02899 void mdt_lock_handle_fini(struct mdt_lock_handle *lh)
02900 {
02901         LASSERT(!lustre_handle_is_used(&lh->mlh_reg_lh));
02902         LASSERT(!lustre_handle_is_used(&lh->mlh_pdo_lh));
02903 }
02904 
02905 /*
02906  * Initialize fields of struct mdt_thread_info. Other fields are left in
02907  * uninitialized state, because it's too expensive to zero out whole
02908  * mdt_thread_info (> 1K) on each request arrival.
02909  */
02910 void mdt_thread_info_init(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
02911                           struct mdt_thread_info *info)
02912 {
02913         int i;
02914 
02915         info->mti_pill = &req->rq_pill;
02916 
02917         /* lock handle */
02918         for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(info->mti_lh); i++)
02919                 mdt_lock_handle_init(&info->mti_lh[i]);
02920 
02921         /* mdt device: it can be NULL while CONNECT */
02922         if (req->rq_export) {
02923                 info->mti_mdt = mdt_dev(req->rq_export->exp_obd->obd_lu_dev);
02924                 info->mti_exp = req->rq_export;
02925         } else
02926                 info->mti_mdt = NULL;
02927         info->mti_env = req->rq_svc_thread->t_env;
02928         info->mti_transno = lustre_msg_get_transno(req->rq_reqmsg);
02929 
02930         memset(&info->mti_attr, 0, sizeof(info->mti_attr));
02931         info->mti_big_buf = LU_BUF_NULL;
02932         info->mti_body = NULL;
02933         info->mti_object = NULL;
02934         info->mti_dlm_req = NULL;
02935         info->mti_has_trans = 0;
02936         info->mti_cross_ref = 0;
02937         info->mti_opdata = 0;
02938         info->mti_big_lmm_used = 0;
02939 
02940         info->mti_spec.no_create = 0;
02941         info->mti_spec.sp_rm_entry = 0;
02942         info->mti_spec.sp_permitted = 0;
02943         info->mti_spec.sp_migrate_close = 0;
02944 
02945         info->mti_spec.u.sp_ea.eadata = NULL;
02946         info->mti_spec.u.sp_ea.eadatalen = 0;
02947 }
02948 
02949 void mdt_thread_info_fini(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
02950 {
02951         int i;
02952 
02953         if (info->mti_object != NULL) {
02954                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, info->mti_object);
02955                 info->mti_object = NULL;
02956         }
02957 
02958         for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(info->mti_lh); i++)
02959                 mdt_lock_handle_fini(&info->mti_lh[i]);
02960         info->mti_env = NULL;
02961         info->mti_pill = NULL;
02962         info->mti_exp = NULL;
02963 
02964         if (unlikely(info->mti_big_buf.lb_buf != NULL))
02965                 lu_buf_free(&info->mti_big_buf);
02966 }
02967 
02968 struct mdt_thread_info *tsi2mdt_info(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02969 {
02970         struct mdt_thread_info  *mti;
02971 
02972         mti = mdt_th_info(tsi->tsi_env);
02973         LASSERT(mti != NULL);
02974 
02975         mdt_thread_info_init(tgt_ses_req(tsi), mti);
02976         if (tsi->tsi_corpus != NULL) {
02977                 mti->mti_object = mdt_obj(tsi->tsi_corpus);
02978                 lu_object_get(tsi->tsi_corpus);
02979         }
02980         mti->mti_body = tsi->tsi_mdt_body;
02981         mti->mti_dlm_req = tsi->tsi_dlm_req;
02982 
02983         return mti;
02984 }
02985 
02986 static int mdt_tgt_connect(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02987 {
02988         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
02989         int                      rc;
02990 
02991         ENTRY;
02992 
02993         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_TGT_DELAY_CONDITIONAL) &&
02994             cfs_fail_val ==
02995             tsi2mdt_info(tsi)->mti_mdt->mdt_seq_site.ss_node_id) {
02996                 set_current_state(TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
02997                 schedule_timeout(msecs_to_jiffies(3 * MSEC_PER_SEC));
02998         }
02999 
03000         rc = tgt_connect(tsi);
03001         if (rc != 0)
03002                 RETURN(rc);
03003 
03004         rc = mdt_init_idmap(tsi);
03005         if (rc != 0)
03006                 GOTO(err, rc);
03007         RETURN(0);
03008 err:
03009         obd_disconnect(class_export_get(req->rq_export));
03010         return rc;
03011 }
03012 
03013 enum mdt_it_code {
03014         MDT_IT_OPEN,
03015         MDT_IT_OCREAT,
03016         MDT_IT_CREATE,
03017         MDT_IT_GETATTR,
03018         MDT_IT_READDIR,
03019         MDT_IT_LOOKUP,
03020         MDT_IT_UNLINK,
03021         MDT_IT_TRUNC,
03022         MDT_IT_GETXATTR,
03023         MDT_IT_LAYOUT,
03024         MDT_IT_QUOTA,
03025         MDT_IT_NR
03026 };
03027 
03028 static int mdt_intent_getattr(enum mdt_it_code opcode,
03029                               struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03030                               struct ldlm_lock **,
03031                               __u64);
03032 
03033 static int mdt_intent_getxattr(enum mdt_it_code opcode,
03034                                 struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03035                                 struct ldlm_lock **lockp,
03036                                 __u64 flags);
03037 
03038 static int mdt_intent_layout(enum mdt_it_code opcode,
03039                              struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03040                              struct ldlm_lock **,
03041                              __u64);
03042 static int mdt_intent_reint(enum mdt_it_code opcode,
03043                             struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03044                             struct ldlm_lock **,
03045                             __u64);
03046 
03047 static struct mdt_it_flavor {
03048         const struct req_format *it_fmt;
03049         __u32                    it_flags;
03050         int                    (*it_act)(enum mdt_it_code ,
03051                                          struct mdt_thread_info *,
03052                                          struct ldlm_lock **,
03053                                          __u64);
03054         long                     it_reint;
03055 } mdt_it_flavor[] = {
03056         [MDT_IT_OPEN]     = {
03057                 .it_fmt   = &RQF_LDLM_INTENT,
03058                 /*.it_flags = HABEO_REFERO,*/
03059                 .it_flags = 0,
03060                 .it_act   = mdt_intent_reint,
03061                 .it_reint = REINT_OPEN
03062         },
03063         [MDT_IT_OCREAT]   = {
03064                 .it_fmt   = &RQF_LDLM_INTENT,
03065                 /*
03066                  * OCREAT is not a MUTABOR request as if the file
03067                  * already exists.
03068                  * We do the extra check of OBD_CONNECT_RDONLY in
03069                  * mdt_reint_open() when we really need to create
03070                  * the object.
03071                  */
03072                 .it_flags = 0,
03073                 .it_act   = mdt_intent_reint,
03074                 .it_reint = REINT_OPEN
03075         },
03076         [MDT_IT_CREATE]   = {
03077                 .it_fmt   = &RQF_LDLM_INTENT,
03078                 .it_flags = MUTABOR,
03079                 .it_act   = mdt_intent_reint,
03080                 .it_reint = REINT_CREATE
03081         },
03082         [MDT_IT_GETATTR]  = {
03083                 .it_fmt   = &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_GETATTR,
03084                 .it_flags = HABEO_REFERO,
03085                 .it_act   = mdt_intent_getattr
03086         },
03087         [MDT_IT_READDIR]  = {
03088                 .it_fmt   = NULL,
03089                 .it_flags = 0,
03090                 .it_act   = NULL
03091         },
03092         [MDT_IT_LOOKUP]   = {
03093                 .it_fmt   = &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_GETATTR,
03094                 .it_flags = HABEO_REFERO,
03095                 .it_act   = mdt_intent_getattr
03096         },
03097         [MDT_IT_UNLINK]   = {
03098                 .it_fmt   = &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_UNLINK,
03099                 .it_flags = MUTABOR,
03100                 .it_act   = NULL,
03101                 .it_reint = REINT_UNLINK
03102         },
03103         [MDT_IT_TRUNC]    = {
03104                 .it_fmt   = NULL,
03105                 .it_flags = MUTABOR,
03106                 .it_act   = NULL
03107         },
03108         [MDT_IT_GETXATTR] = {
03109                 .it_fmt   = &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_GETXATTR,
03110                 .it_flags = HABEO_CORPUS,
03111                 .it_act   = mdt_intent_getxattr
03112         },
03113         [MDT_IT_LAYOUT] = {
03114                 .it_fmt   = &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_LAYOUT,
03115                 .it_flags = 0,
03116                 .it_act   = mdt_intent_layout
03117         }
03118 };
03119 
03120 static int
03121 mdt_intent_lock_replace(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03122                         struct ldlm_lock **lockp,
03123                         struct mdt_lock_handle *lh,
03124                         __u64 flags, int result)
03125 {
03126         struct ptlrpc_request  *req = mdt_info_req(info);
03127         struct ldlm_lock       *lock = *lockp;
03128         struct ldlm_lock       *new_lock;
03129 
03130         /* If possible resent found a lock, @lh is set to its handle */
03131         new_lock = ldlm_handle2lock_long(&lh->mlh_reg_lh, 0);
03132 
03133         if (new_lock == NULL && (flags & LDLM_FL_INTENT_ONLY)) {
03134                 lh->mlh_reg_lh.cookie = 0;
03135                 RETURN(0);
03136         }
03137 
03138         if (new_lock == NULL && (flags & LDLM_FL_RESENT)) {
03139                 /* Lock is pinned by ldlm_handle_enqueue0() as it is
03140                  * a resend case, however, it could be already destroyed
03141                  * due to client eviction or a raced cancel RPC. */
03142                 LDLM_DEBUG_NOLOCK("Invalid lock handle "LPX64"\n",
03143                                   lh->mlh_reg_lh.cookie);
03144                 lh->mlh_reg_lh.cookie = 0;
03145                 RETURN(-ESTALE);
03146         }
03147 
03148         LASSERTF(new_lock != NULL,
03149                  "lockh "LPX64" flags "LPX64" rc %d\n",
03150                  lh->mlh_reg_lh.cookie, flags, result);
03151 
03152         /*
03153          * If we've already given this lock to a client once, then we should
03154          * have no readers or writers.  Otherwise, we should have one reader
03155          * _or_ writer ref (which will be zeroed below) before returning the
03156          * lock to a client.
03157          */
03158         if (new_lock->l_export == req->rq_export) {
03159                 LASSERT(new_lock->l_readers + new_lock->l_writers == 0);
03160         } else {
03161                 LASSERT(new_lock->l_export == NULL);
03162                 LASSERT(new_lock->l_readers + new_lock->l_writers == 1);
03163         }
03164 
03165         *lockp = new_lock;
03166 
03167         if (new_lock->l_export == req->rq_export) {
03168                 /*
03169                  * Already gave this to the client, which means that we
03170                  * reconstructed a reply.
03171                  */
03172                 LASSERT(lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) &
03173                         MSG_RESENT);
03174 
03175                 LDLM_LOCK_RELEASE(new_lock);
03176                 lh->mlh_reg_lh.cookie = 0;
03177                 RETURN(ELDLM_LOCK_REPLACED);
03178         }
03179 
03180         /*
03181          * Fixup the lock to be given to the client.
03182          */
03183         lock_res_and_lock(new_lock);
03184         /* Zero new_lock->l_readers and new_lock->l_writers without triggering
03185          * possible blocking AST. */
03186         while (new_lock->l_readers > 0) {
03187                 lu_ref_del(&new_lock->l_reference, "reader", new_lock);
03188                 lu_ref_del(&new_lock->l_reference, "user", new_lock);
03189                 new_lock->l_readers--;
03190         }
03191         while (new_lock->l_writers > 0) {
03192                 lu_ref_del(&new_lock->l_reference, "writer", new_lock);
03193                 lu_ref_del(&new_lock->l_reference, "user", new_lock);
03194                 new_lock->l_writers--;
03195         }
03196 
03197         new_lock->l_export = class_export_lock_get(req->rq_export, new_lock);
03198         new_lock->l_blocking_ast = lock->l_blocking_ast;
03199         new_lock->l_completion_ast = lock->l_completion_ast;
03200         new_lock->l_remote_handle = lock->l_remote_handle;
03201         new_lock->l_flags &= ~LDLM_FL_LOCAL;
03202 
03203         unlock_res_and_lock(new_lock);
03204 
03205         cfs_hash_add(new_lock->l_export->exp_lock_hash,
03206                      &new_lock->l_remote_handle,
03207                      &new_lock->l_exp_hash);
03208 
03209         LDLM_LOCK_RELEASE(new_lock);
03210         lh->mlh_reg_lh.cookie = 0;
03211 
03212         RETURN(ELDLM_LOCK_REPLACED);
03213 }
03214 
03215 static void mdt_intent_fixup_resent(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03216                                     struct ldlm_lock *new_lock,
03217                                     struct mdt_lock_handle *lh,
03218                                     __u64 flags)
03219 {
03220         struct ptlrpc_request  *req = mdt_info_req(info);
03221         struct ldlm_request    *dlmreq;
03222 
03223         if (!(lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & MSG_RESENT))
03224                 return;
03225 
03226         dlmreq = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_DLM_REQ);
03227 
03228         /* Check if this is a resend case (MSG_RESENT is set on RPC) and a
03229          * lock was found by ldlm_handle_enqueue(); if so @lh must be
03230          * initialized. */
03231         if (flags & LDLM_FL_RESENT) {
03232                 lh->mlh_reg_lh.cookie = new_lock->l_handle.h_cookie;
03233                 lh->mlh_reg_mode = new_lock->l_granted_mode;
03234 
03235                 LDLM_DEBUG(new_lock, "Restoring lock cookie");
03236                 DEBUG_REQ(D_DLMTRACE, req, "restoring lock cookie "LPX64,
03237                           lh->mlh_reg_lh.cookie);
03238                 return;
03239         }
03240 
03241         /*
03242          * If the xid matches, then we know this is a resent request, and allow
03243          * it. (It's probably an OPEN, for which we don't send a lock.
03244          */
03245         if (req_can_reconstruct(req, NULL))
03246                 return;
03247 
03248         /*
03249          * This remote handle isn't enqueued, so we never received or processed
03250          * this request.  Clear MSG_RESENT, because it can be handled like any
03251          * normal request now.
03252          */
03253         lustre_msg_clear_flags(req->rq_reqmsg, MSG_RESENT);
03254 
03255         DEBUG_REQ(D_DLMTRACE, req, "no existing lock with rhandle "LPX64,
03256                   dlmreq->lock_handle[0].cookie);
03257 }
03258 
03259 static int mdt_intent_getxattr(enum mdt_it_code opcode,
03260                                 struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03261                                 struct ldlm_lock **lockp,
03262                                 __u64 flags)
03263 {
03264         struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_RMT];
03265         struct ldlm_reply      *ldlm_rep = NULL;
03266         int rc, grc;
03267 
03268         /*
03269          * Initialize lhc->mlh_reg_lh either from a previously granted lock
03270          * (for the resend case) or a new lock. Below we will use it to
03271          * replace the original lock.
03272          */
03273         mdt_intent_fixup_resent(info, *lockp, lhc, flags);
03274         if (!lustre_handle_is_used(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh)) {
03275                 mdt_lock_reg_init(lhc, (*lockp)->l_req_mode);
03276                 rc = mdt_object_lock(info, info->mti_object, lhc,
03277                                      MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR);
03278                 if (rc)
03279                         return rc;
03280         }
03281 
03282         grc = mdt_getxattr(info);
03283 
03284         rc = mdt_intent_lock_replace(info, lockp, lhc, flags, 0);
03285 
03286         if (mdt_info_req(info)->rq_repmsg != NULL)
03287                 ldlm_rep = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_DLM_REP);
03288         if (ldlm_rep == NULL)
03289                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
03290 
03291         ldlm_rep->lock_policy_res2 = grc;
03292 
03293         return rc;
03294 }
03295 
03296 static int mdt_intent_getattr(enum mdt_it_code opcode,
03297                               struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03298                               struct ldlm_lock **lockp,
03299                               __u64 flags)
03300 {
03301         struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_RMT];
03302         __u64                   child_bits;
03303         struct ldlm_reply      *ldlm_rep;
03304         struct mdt_body        *reqbody;
03305         struct mdt_body        *repbody;
03306         int                     rc, rc2;
03307         ENTRY;
03308 
03309         reqbody = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
03310         LASSERT(reqbody);
03311 
03312         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
03313         LASSERT(repbody);
03314 
03315         info->mti_cross_ref = !!(reqbody->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLCROSSREF);
03316         repbody->mbo_eadatasize = 0;
03317         repbody->mbo_aclsize = 0;
03318 
03319         switch (opcode) {
03320         case MDT_IT_LOOKUP:
03321                 child_bits = MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP | MDS_INODELOCK_PERM;
03322                 break;
03323         case MDT_IT_GETATTR:
03324                 child_bits = MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP | MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE |
03325                              MDS_INODELOCK_PERM;
03326                 break;
03327         default:
03328                 CERROR("Unsupported intent (%d)\n", opcode);
03329                 GOTO(out_shrink, rc = -EINVAL);
03330         }
03331 
03332         rc = mdt_init_ucred_intent_getattr(info, reqbody);
03333         if (rc)
03334                 GOTO(out_shrink, rc);
03335 
03336         ldlm_rep = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_DLM_REP);
03337         mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_IT_EXECD);
03338 
03339         /* Get lock from request for possible resent case. */
03340         mdt_intent_fixup_resent(info, *lockp, lhc, flags);
03341 
03342         rc = mdt_getattr_name_lock(info, lhc, child_bits, ldlm_rep);
03343         ldlm_rep->lock_policy_res2 = clear_serious(rc);
03344 
03345         if (mdt_get_disposition(ldlm_rep, DISP_LOOKUP_NEG))
03346                 ldlm_rep->lock_policy_res2 = 0;
03347         if (!mdt_get_disposition(ldlm_rep, DISP_LOOKUP_POS) ||
03348             ldlm_rep->lock_policy_res2) {
03349                 lhc->mlh_reg_lh.cookie = 0ull;
03350                 GOTO(out_ucred, rc = ELDLM_LOCK_ABORTED);
03351         }
03352 
03353         rc = mdt_intent_lock_replace(info, lockp, lhc, flags, rc);
03354         EXIT;
03355 out_ucred:
03356         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
03357 out_shrink:
03358         mdt_client_compatibility(info);
03359         rc2 = mdt_fix_reply(info);
03360         if (rc == 0)
03361                 rc = rc2;
03362         return rc;
03363 }
03364 
03365 static int mdt_intent_layout(enum mdt_it_code opcode,
03366                              struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03367                              struct ldlm_lock **lockp,
03368                              __u64 flags)
03369 {
03370         struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_LAYOUT];
03371         struct layout_intent *layout;
03372         struct lu_fid *fid;
03373         struct mdt_object *obj = NULL;
03374         int layout_size = 0;
03375         int rc = 0;
03376         ENTRY;
03377 
03378         if (opcode != MDT_IT_LAYOUT) {
03379                 CERROR("%s: Unknown intent (%d)\n", mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
03380                         opcode);
03381                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
03382         }
03383 
03384         layout = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_LAYOUT_INTENT);
03385         if (layout == NULL)
03386                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
03387 
03388         if (layout->li_opc != LAYOUT_INTENT_ACCESS) {
03389                 CERROR("%s: Unsupported layout intent opc %d\n",
03390                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), layout->li_opc);
03391                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
03392         }
03393 
03394         fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid2;
03395         fid_extract_from_res_name(fid, &(*lockp)->l_resource->lr_name);
03396 
03397         /* Get lock from request for possible resent case. */
03398         mdt_intent_fixup_resent(info, *lockp, lhc, flags);
03399 
03400         obj = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, fid);
03401         if (IS_ERR(obj))
03402                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
03403 
03404         if (mdt_object_exists(obj) && !mdt_object_remote(obj)) {
03405                 layout_size = mdt_attr_get_eabuf_size(info, obj);
03406                 if (layout_size < 0)
03407                         GOTO(out_obj, rc = layout_size);
03408 
03409                 if (layout_size > info->mti_mdt->mdt_max_mdsize)
03410                         info->mti_mdt->mdt_max_mdsize = layout_size;
03411         }
03412 
03413         (*lockp)->l_lvb_type = LVB_T_LAYOUT;
03414         req_capsule_set_size(info->mti_pill, &RMF_DLM_LVB, RCL_SERVER,
03415                              layout_size);
03416         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(info->mti_pill);
03417         GOTO(out_obj, rc);
03418 
03419 out_obj:
03420         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, obj);
03421 
03422         if (rc == 0 && lustre_handle_is_used(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh))
03423                 rc = mdt_intent_lock_replace(info, lockp, lhc, flags, rc);
03424 
03425 out:
03426         lhc->mlh_reg_lh.cookie = 0;
03427 
03428         return rc;
03429 }
03430 
03431 static int mdt_intent_reint(enum mdt_it_code opcode,
03432                             struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03433                             struct ldlm_lock **lockp,
03434                             __u64 flags)
03435 {
03436         struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_RMT];
03437         struct ldlm_reply      *rep = NULL;
03438         long                    opc;
03439         int                     rc;
03440 
03441         static const struct req_format *intent_fmts[REINT_MAX] = {
03442                 [REINT_CREATE]  = &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_CREATE,
03443                 [REINT_OPEN]    = &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_OPEN
03444         };
03445 
03446         ENTRY;
03447 
03448         opc = mdt_reint_opcode(mdt_info_req(info), intent_fmts);
03449         if (opc < 0)
03450                 RETURN(opc);
03451 
03452         if (mdt_it_flavor[opcode].it_reint != opc) {
03453                 CERROR("Reint code %ld doesn't match intent: %d\n",
03454                        opc, opcode);
03455                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
03456         }
03457 
03458         /* Get lock from request for possible resent case. */
03459         mdt_intent_fixup_resent(info, *lockp, lhc, flags);
03460 
03461         rc = mdt_reint_internal(info, lhc, opc);
03462 
03463         /* Check whether the reply has been packed successfully. */
03464         if (mdt_info_req(info)->rq_repmsg != NULL)
03465                 rep = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_DLM_REP);
03466         if (rep == NULL)
03467                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
03468 
03469         /* MDC expects this in any case */
03470         if (rc != 0)
03471                 mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, DISP_LOOKUP_EXECD);
03472 
03473         /* the open lock or the lock for cross-ref object should be
03474          * returned to the client */
03475         if (lustre_handle_is_used(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh) &&
03476             (rc == 0 || rc == -MDT_EREMOTE_OPEN)) {
03477                 rep->lock_policy_res2 = 0;
03478                 rc = mdt_intent_lock_replace(info, lockp, lhc, flags, rc);
03479                 RETURN(rc);
03480         }
03481 
03482         rep->lock_policy_res2 = clear_serious(rc);
03483 
03484         if (rep->lock_policy_res2 == -ENOENT &&
03485             mdt_get_disposition(rep, DISP_LOOKUP_NEG) &&
03486             !mdt_get_disposition(rep, DISP_OPEN_CREATE))
03487                 rep->lock_policy_res2 = 0;
03488 
03489         lhc->mlh_reg_lh.cookie = 0ull;
03490         if (rc == -ENOTCONN || rc == -ENODEV ||
03491             rc == -EOVERFLOW) { 
03492                 /*
03493                  * If it is the disconnect error (ENODEV & ENOCONN), the error
03494                  * will be returned by rq_status, and client at ptlrpc layer
03495                  * will detect this, then disconnect, reconnect the import
03496                  * immediately, instead of impacting the following the rpc.
03497                  */
03498                 RETURN(rc);
03499         }
03500         /*
03501          * For other cases, the error will be returned by intent, and client
03502          * will retrieve the result from intent.
03503          */
03504         RETURN(ELDLM_LOCK_ABORTED);
03505 }
03506 
03507 static int mdt_intent_code(enum ldlm_intent_flags itcode)
03508 {
03509         int rc;
03510 
03511         switch (itcode) {
03512         case IT_OPEN:
03513                 rc = MDT_IT_OPEN;
03514                 break;
03515         case IT_OPEN|IT_CREAT:
03516                 rc = MDT_IT_OCREAT;
03517                 break;
03518         case IT_CREAT:
03519                 rc = MDT_IT_CREATE;
03520                 break;
03521         case IT_READDIR:
03522                 rc = MDT_IT_READDIR;
03523                 break;
03524         case IT_GETATTR:
03525                 rc = MDT_IT_GETATTR;
03526                 break;
03527         case IT_LOOKUP:
03528                 rc = MDT_IT_LOOKUP;
03529                 break;
03530         case IT_UNLINK:
03531                 rc = MDT_IT_UNLINK;
03532                 break;
03533         case IT_TRUNC:
03534                 rc = MDT_IT_TRUNC;
03535                 break;
03536         case IT_GETXATTR:
03537                 rc = MDT_IT_GETXATTR;
03538                 break;
03539         case IT_LAYOUT:
03540                 rc = MDT_IT_LAYOUT;
03541                 break;
03542         case IT_QUOTA_DQACQ:
03543         case IT_QUOTA_CONN:
03544                 rc = MDT_IT_QUOTA;
03545                 break;
03546         default:
03547                 CERROR("Unknown intent opcode: 0x%08x\n", itcode);
03548                 rc = -EINVAL;
03549                 break;
03550         }
03551         return rc;
03552 }
03553 
03554 static int mdt_intent_opc(enum ldlm_intent_flags itopc,
03555                           struct mdt_thread_info *info,
03556                           struct ldlm_lock **lockp, __u64 flags)
03557 {
03558         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
03559         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
03560         struct mdt_it_flavor    *flv;
03561         int opc;
03562         int rc;
03563         ENTRY;
03564 
03565         opc = mdt_intent_code(itopc);
03566         if (opc < 0)
03567                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
03568 
03569         if (opc == MDT_IT_QUOTA) {
03570                 struct lu_device *qmt = info->mti_mdt->mdt_qmt_dev;
03571 
03572                 if (qmt == NULL)
03573                         RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
03574 
03575                 (*lockp)->l_lvb_type = LVB_T_LQUOTA;
03576                 /* pass the request to quota master */
03577                 rc = qmt_hdls.qmth_intent_policy(info->mti_env, qmt,
03578                                                  mdt_info_req(info), lockp,
03579                                                  flags);
03580                 RETURN(rc);
03581         }
03582 
03583         flv = &mdt_it_flavor[opc];
03584         if (flv->it_fmt != NULL)
03585                 req_capsule_extend(pill, flv->it_fmt);
03586 
03587         rc = mdt_unpack_req_pack_rep(info, flv->it_flags);
03588         if (rc < 0)
03589                 RETURN(rc);
03590 
03591         if (flv->it_flags & MUTABOR &&
03592             exp_connect_flags(req->rq_export) & OBD_CONNECT_RDONLY)
03593                 RETURN(-EROFS);
03594 
03595         if (flv->it_act != NULL) {
03596                 struct ldlm_reply *rep;
03597 
03598                 OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_INTENT_DELAY, 10);
03599 
03600                 /* execute policy */
03601                 rc = flv->it_act(opc, info, lockp, flags);
03602 
03603                 /* Check whether the reply has been packed successfully. */
03604                 if (req->rq_repmsg != NULL) {
03605                         rep = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill,
03606                                                      &RMF_DLM_REP);
03607                         rep->lock_policy_res2 =
03608                                 ptlrpc_status_hton(rep->lock_policy_res2);
03609                 }
03610         }
03611 
03612         RETURN(rc);
03613 }
03614 
03615 static int mdt_intent_policy(struct ldlm_namespace *ns,
03616                              struct ldlm_lock **lockp, void *req_cookie,
03617                              enum ldlm_mode mode, __u64 flags, void *data)
03618 {
03619         struct tgt_session_info *tsi;
03620         struct mdt_thread_info  *info;
03621         struct ptlrpc_request   *req  =  req_cookie;
03622         struct ldlm_intent      *it;
03623         struct req_capsule      *pill;
03624         int rc;
03625 
03626         ENTRY;
03627 
03628         LASSERT(req != NULL);
03629 
03630         tsi = tgt_ses_info(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env);
03631 
03632         info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
03633         LASSERT(info != NULL);
03634         pill = info->mti_pill;
03635         LASSERT(pill->rc_req == req);
03636 
03637         if (req->rq_reqmsg->lm_bufcount > DLM_INTENT_IT_OFF) {
03638                 req_capsule_extend(pill, &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_BASIC);
03639                 it = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_LDLM_INTENT);
03640                 if (it != NULL) {
03641                         rc = mdt_intent_opc(it->opc, info, lockp, flags);
03642                         if (rc == 0)
03643                                 rc = ELDLM_OK;
03644 
03645                         /* Lock without inodebits makes no sense and will oops
03646                          * later in ldlm. Let's check it now to see if we have
03647                          * ibits corrupted somewhere in mdt_intent_opc().
03648                          * The case for client miss to set ibits has been
03649                          * processed by others. */
03650                         LASSERT(ergo(info->mti_dlm_req->lock_desc.l_resource.\
03651                                         lr_type == LDLM_IBITS,
03652                                      info->mti_dlm_req->lock_desc.\
03653                                         l_policy_data.l_inodebits.bits != 0));
03654                 } else
03655                         rc = err_serious(-EFAULT);
03656         } else {
03657                 /* No intent was provided */
03658                 LASSERT(pill->rc_fmt == &RQF_LDLM_ENQUEUE);
03659                 req_capsule_set_size(pill, &RMF_DLM_LVB, RCL_SERVER, 0);
03660                 rc = req_capsule_server_pack(pill);
03661                 if (rc)
03662                         rc = err_serious(rc);
03663         }
03664         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
03665         RETURN(rc);
03666 }
03667 
03668 static void mdt_deregister_seq_exp(struct mdt_device *mdt)
03669 {
03670         struct seq_server_site  *ss = mdt_seq_site(mdt);
03671 
03672         if (ss->ss_node_id == 0)
03673                 return;
03674 
03675         if (ss->ss_client_seq != NULL) {
03676                 lustre_deregister_lwp_item(&ss->ss_client_seq->lcs_exp);
03677                 ss->ss_client_seq->lcs_exp = NULL;
03678         }
03679 
03680         if (ss->ss_server_fld != NULL) {
03681                 lustre_deregister_lwp_item(&ss->ss_server_fld->lsf_control_exp);
03682                 ss->ss_server_fld->lsf_control_exp = NULL;
03683         }
03684 }
03685 
03686 static void mdt_seq_fini_cli(struct mdt_device *mdt)
03687 {
03688         struct seq_server_site *ss = mdt_seq_site(mdt);
03689 
03690         if (ss == NULL)
03691                 return;
03692 
03693         if (ss->ss_server_seq != NULL)
03694                 seq_server_set_cli(NULL, ss->ss_server_seq, NULL);
03695 }
03696 
03697 static int mdt_seq_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *mdt)
03698 {
03699         mdt_seq_fini_cli(mdt);
03700         mdt_deregister_seq_exp(mdt);
03701 
03702         return seq_site_fini(env, mdt_seq_site(mdt));
03703 }
03704 
03710 static int mdt_register_lwp_callback(void *data)
03711 {
03712         struct lu_env           env;
03713         struct mdt_device       *mdt = data;
03714         struct lu_server_fld    *fld = mdt_seq_site(mdt)->ss_server_fld;
03715         int                     rc;
03716         ENTRY;
03717 
03718         LASSERT(mdt_seq_site(mdt)->ss_node_id != 0);
03719 
03720         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_MD_THREAD);
03721         if (rc < 0) {
03722                 CERROR("%s: cannot init env: rc = %d\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
03723                 RETURN(rc);
03724         }
03725 
03726         /* Allocate new sequence now to avoid creating local transaction
03727          * in the normal transaction process */
03728         rc = seq_server_check_and_alloc_super(&env,
03729                                               mdt_seq_site(mdt)->ss_server_seq);
03730         if (rc < 0)
03731                 GOTO(out, rc);
03732 
03733         if (fld->lsf_new) {
03734                 rc = fld_update_from_controller(&env, fld);
03735                 if (rc != 0) {
03736                         CERROR("%s: cannot update controller: rc = %d\n",
03737                                mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
03738                         GOTO(out, rc);
03739                 }
03740         }
03741 out:
03742         lu_env_fini(&env);
03743         RETURN(rc);
03744 }
03745 
03746 static int mdt_register_seq_exp(struct mdt_device *mdt)
03747 {
03748         struct seq_server_site  *ss = mdt_seq_site(mdt);
03749         char                    *lwp_name = NULL;
03750         int                     rc;
03751 
03752         if (ss->ss_node_id == 0)
03753                 return 0;
03754 
03755         OBD_ALLOC(lwp_name, MAX_OBD_NAME);
03756         if (lwp_name == NULL)
03757                 GOTO(out_free, rc = -ENOMEM);
03758 
03759         rc = tgt_name2lwp_name(mdt_obd_name(mdt), lwp_name, MAX_OBD_NAME, 0);
03760         if (rc != 0)
03761                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
03762 
03763         rc = lustre_register_lwp_item(lwp_name, &ss->ss_client_seq->lcs_exp,
03764                                       NULL, NULL);
03765         if (rc != 0)
03766                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
03767 
03768         rc = lustre_register_lwp_item(lwp_name,
03769                                       &ss->ss_server_fld->lsf_control_exp,
03770                                       mdt_register_lwp_callback, mdt);
03771         if (rc != 0) {
03772                 lustre_deregister_lwp_item(&ss->ss_client_seq->lcs_exp);
03773                 ss->ss_client_seq->lcs_exp = NULL;
03774                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
03775         }
03776 out_free:
03777         if (lwp_name != NULL)
03778                 OBD_FREE(lwp_name, MAX_OBD_NAME);
03779 
03780         return rc;
03781 }
03782 
03783 /*
03784  * Init client sequence manager which is used by local MDS to talk to sequence
03785  * controller on remote node.
03786  */
03787 static int mdt_seq_init_cli(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *mdt)
03788 {
03789         struct seq_server_site  *ss = mdt_seq_site(mdt);
03790         int                     rc;
03791         char                    *prefix;
03792         ENTRY;
03793 
03794         /* check if this is adding the first MDC and controller is not yet
03795          * initialized. */
03796         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ss->ss_client_seq);
03797         if (ss->ss_client_seq == NULL)
03798                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
03799 
03800         OBD_ALLOC(prefix, MAX_OBD_NAME + 5);
03801         if (prefix == NULL) {
03802                 OBD_FREE_PTR(ss->ss_client_seq);
03803                 ss->ss_client_seq = NULL;
03804                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
03805         }
03806 
03807         /* Note: seq_client_fini will be called in seq_site_fini */
03808         snprintf(prefix, MAX_OBD_NAME + 5, "ctl-%s", mdt_obd_name(mdt));
03809         rc = seq_client_init(ss->ss_client_seq, NULL, LUSTRE_SEQ_METADATA,
03810                              prefix, ss->ss_node_id == 0 ?  ss->ss_control_seq :
03811                                                             NULL);
03812         OBD_FREE(prefix, MAX_OBD_NAME + 5);
03813         if (rc != 0) {
03814                 OBD_FREE_PTR(ss->ss_client_seq);
03815                 ss->ss_client_seq = NULL;
03816                 RETURN(rc);
03817         }
03818 
03819         rc = seq_server_set_cli(env, ss->ss_server_seq, ss->ss_client_seq);
03820 
03821         RETURN(rc);
03822 }
03823 
03824 static int mdt_seq_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *mdt)
03825 {
03826         struct seq_server_site  *ss;
03827         int                     rc;
03828         ENTRY;
03829 
03830         ss = mdt_seq_site(mdt);
03831         /* init sequence controller server(MDT0) */
03832         if (ss->ss_node_id == 0) {
03833                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ss->ss_control_seq);
03834                 if (ss->ss_control_seq == NULL)
03835                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
03836 
03837                 rc = seq_server_init(env, ss->ss_control_seq, mdt->mdt_bottom,
03838                                      mdt_obd_name(mdt), LUSTRE_SEQ_CONTROLLER,
03839                                      ss);
03840                 if (rc)
03841                         GOTO(out_seq_fini, rc);
03842         }
03843 
03844         /* Init normal sequence server */
03845         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ss->ss_server_seq);
03846         if (ss->ss_server_seq == NULL)
03847                 GOTO(out_seq_fini, rc = -ENOMEM);
03848 
03849         rc = seq_server_init(env, ss->ss_server_seq, mdt->mdt_bottom,
03850                              mdt_obd_name(mdt), LUSTRE_SEQ_SERVER, ss);
03851         if (rc)
03852                 GOTO(out_seq_fini, rc);
03853 
03854         /* init seq client for seq server to talk to seq controller(MDT0) */
03855         rc = mdt_seq_init_cli(env, mdt);
03856         if (rc != 0)
03857                 GOTO(out_seq_fini, rc);
03858 
03859         if (ss->ss_node_id != 0)
03860                 /* register controller export through lwp */
03861                 rc = mdt_register_seq_exp(mdt);
03862 
03863         EXIT;
03864 out_seq_fini:
03865         if (rc)
03866                 mdt_seq_fini(env, mdt);
03867 
03868         return rc;
03869 }
03870 
03871 /*
03872  * FLD wrappers
03873  */
03874 static int mdt_fld_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
03875                         struct mdt_device *m)
03876 {
03877         struct seq_server_site *ss = mdt_seq_site(m);
03878         ENTRY;
03879 
03880         if (ss && ss->ss_server_fld) {
03881                 fld_server_fini(env, ss->ss_server_fld);
03882                 OBD_FREE_PTR(ss->ss_server_fld);
03883                 ss->ss_server_fld = NULL;
03884         }
03885 
03886         RETURN(0);
03887 }
03888 
03889 static int mdt_fld_init(const struct lu_env *env,
03890                         const char *uuid,
03891                         struct mdt_device *m)
03892 {
03893         struct seq_server_site *ss;
03894         int rc;
03895         ENTRY;
03896 
03897         ss = mdt_seq_site(m);
03898 
03899         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ss->ss_server_fld);
03900         if (ss->ss_server_fld == NULL)
03901                 RETURN(rc = -ENOMEM);
03902 
03903         rc = fld_server_init(env, ss->ss_server_fld, m->mdt_bottom, uuid,
03904                              LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT);
03905         if (rc) {
03906                 OBD_FREE_PTR(ss->ss_server_fld);
03907                 ss->ss_server_fld = NULL;
03908                 RETURN(rc);
03909         }
03910 
03911         RETURN(0);
03912 }
03913 
03914 static void mdt_stack_pre_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
03915                            struct mdt_device *m, struct lu_device *top)
03916 {
03917         struct lustre_cfg_bufs  *bufs;
03918         struct lustre_cfg       *lcfg;
03919         struct mdt_thread_info  *info;
03920         ENTRY;
03921 
03922         LASSERT(top);
03923 
03924         info = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
03925         LASSERT(info != NULL);
03926 
03927         bufs = &info->mti_u.bufs;
03928 
03929         LASSERT(m->mdt_child_exp);
03930         LASSERT(m->mdt_child_exp->exp_obd);
03931 
03932         /* process cleanup, pass mdt obd name to get obd umount flags */
03933         /* XXX: this is needed because all layers are referenced by
03934          * objects (some of them are pinned by osd, for example *
03935          * the proper solution should be a model where object used
03936          * by osd only doesn't have mdt/mdd slices -bzzz */
03937         lustre_cfg_bufs_reset(bufs, mdt_obd_name(m));
03938         lustre_cfg_bufs_set_string(bufs, 1, NULL);
03939         lcfg = lustre_cfg_new(LCFG_PRE_CLEANUP, bufs);
03940         if (lcfg == NULL)
03941                 RETURN_EXIT;
03942 
03943         top->ld_ops->ldo_process_config(env, top, lcfg);
03944         lustre_cfg_free(lcfg);
03945         EXIT;
03946 }
03947 
03948 static void mdt_stack_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
03949                            struct mdt_device *m, struct lu_device *top)
03950 {
03951         struct obd_device       *obd = mdt2obd_dev(m);
03952         struct lustre_cfg_bufs  *bufs;
03953         struct lustre_cfg       *lcfg;
03954         struct mdt_thread_info  *info;
03955         char                     flags[3] = "";
03956         ENTRY;
03957 
03958         info = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
03959         LASSERT(info != NULL);
03960 
03961         lu_dev_del_linkage(top->ld_site, top);
03962 
03963         lu_site_purge(env, top->ld_site, -1);
03964 
03965         bufs = &info->mti_u.bufs;
03966         /* process cleanup, pass mdt obd name to get obd umount flags */
03967         /* another purpose is to let all layers to release their objects */
03968         lustre_cfg_bufs_reset(bufs, mdt_obd_name(m));
03969         if (obd->obd_force)
03970                 strcat(flags, "F");
03971         if (obd->obd_fail)
03972                 strcat(flags, "A");
03973         lustre_cfg_bufs_set_string(bufs, 1, flags);
03974         lcfg = lustre_cfg_new(LCFG_CLEANUP, bufs);
03975         if (lcfg == NULL)
03976                 RETURN_EXIT;
03977 
03978         LASSERT(top);
03979         top->ld_ops->ldo_process_config(env, top, lcfg);
03980         lustre_cfg_free(lcfg);
03981 
03982         lu_site_purge(env, top->ld_site, -1);
03983 
03984         m->mdt_child = NULL;
03985         m->mdt_bottom = NULL;
03986 
03987         obd_disconnect(m->mdt_child_exp);
03988         m->mdt_child_exp = NULL;
03989 
03990         obd_disconnect(m->mdt_bottom_exp);
03991         m->mdt_child_exp = NULL;
03992 }
03993 
03994 static int mdt_connect_to_next(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *m,
03995                                const char *next, struct obd_export **exp)
03996 {
03997         struct obd_connect_data *data = NULL;
03998         struct obd_device       *obd;
03999         int                      rc;
04000         ENTRY;
04001 
04002         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(data);
04003         if (data == NULL)
04004                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
04005 
04006         obd = class_name2obd(next);
04007         if (obd == NULL) {
04008                 CERROR("%s: can't locate next device: %s\n",
